item.title: INICIO
item.dc:creator: k.barrera.ordenes@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Products" _builder_version="4.9.4" use_background_color_gradient="on" background_color_gradient_start="#40b5c7" background_color_gradient_end="rgba(64,181,199,0.38)" background_image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Form-02.png" custom_margin="-4px||-4px||true|" custom_padding="0px||1px|||" border_color_all="#31d190" locked="off"][et_pb_row admin_label="Fila" _builder_version="4.9.4" min_height="130px" custom_margin="3px|auto|-2px|auto||" custom_padding="0px||0px|||" collapsed="off"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_slider _builder_version="4.9.4" _dynamic_attributes="link_option_url" _module_preset="default" header_font="Poppins|600|||||||" header_text_align="right" header_text_color="#E5E2EB" header_font_size="40px" header_line_height="1.2em" body_font="Poppins|500|||||||" body_text_align="left" background_color="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" custom_button="on" button_bg_color="#E09900" button_border_width="0px" button_border_color="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" button_border_radius="25px" button_letter_spacing="2px" button_font="Poppins|500|||||||" button_alignment="right" text_orientation="right" min_height="553px" custom_margin="-16px|||||" custom_padding="0px||111px|||" link_option_url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjE1NyJ9fQ==@" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_slide heading="INDUSTRIA Y LOGÍSTICA ECOAMIGABLE" button_text="LEER MÁS" button_link="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjE1NyJ9fQ==@" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Diapositiva1-5.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.4" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_transition="on" header_font_size="25px" sticky_enabled="0" title_text="Diapositiva1" header_line_height="2em"]

Involucra una mirada sostenible y tecnológica de los Principales sectores industriales de la región, buscando una transición hacia las energías renovables y la incorporación de interconectividad y  automatización en los procesos productivos. De esta forma, los principales factores competitivos de la región son su importante industria minera, su potencial energético fotovoltaico y el comercio presente a través del puerto de Iquique y la zofri.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="INDUSTRIAS VERDES Y AGRITECH" button_text="LEER MÁS" button_link="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjE1OCJ9fQ==@" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Diapositiva1-6.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.4" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_transition="on" title_text="Diapositiva1" sticky_enabled="0" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="4em"]

Las condiciones edafoclimáticas presentes en la región, además de sus pisos ecológicos, la sitúan en una posición ideal para el desarrollo especies de alto valor alimentario. De esta manera, se encuentran
alimentos como la quinua en el altiplano; limón de Pica, azafrán y dátiles en la  pampa; y productos marinos típicos como pescados o mariscos, además de otros de diversas aplicaciones biotecnológicas como las microalgas.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="TURISMO DE INTERESES ESPECIALES" button_text="LEER MÁS" button_link="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjE2MCJ9fQ==@" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Diapositiva1-7.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.4" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_transition="on" header_font_size="25px" title_text="Diapositiva1" header_line_height="4em" sticky_enabled="0"]

En el sector turístico, la Región de Tarapacá tiene una amplia oferta, destacando el turismo de bienestar y salud, con sus playas, paisajes desérticos, de altura y salares; turismo arqueológico y paleontológico en sus huellas de  dinosaurios, geoglifos, icnitas y otros vestigios de las culturas precolombinas; turismo corporativo con sus costas y su clima ideal para congresos y conferencias; y su turismo étnico cultural con las influencias quechua y aimaras y sus fiestas religiosas.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="CALIDAD DE VIDA Y TERRITORIOS INTELIGENTES" button_text="LEER MÁS" button_link="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjE1OSJ9fQ==@" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Diapositiva1-8.jpg" heading_last_edited="off|desktop" _builder_version="4.9.4" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" header_font_tablet="" header_font_phone="" header_font_last_edited="on|desktop" border_width_all_image="1px" border_color_all_image="#E5E2EB" sticky_transition="on" sticky_enabled="0" title_text="Diapositiva1" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="2em"]

La Región presenta ciertas ventajas y oportunidades para ubicarse a la vanguardia en sustentabilidad a nivel nacional y mejorar la calidad de vida de su población. La reciente creación del Centro de Economía Circular para la macrozona norte del país y su potencial en energía solar abren un panorama favorable para el desarrollo de la economía circular en la región, que además ocupa el 3er lugar a nivel latinoamericano en el Índice de Desarrollo Humano Subnacional, desarrollado por la Universidad Autónoma de Barcelona el año 2018.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="atraccion" _builder_version="4.9.4" custom_margin="-13px||-13px||true|" custom_padding="0px||1px|||" border_color_all="#31d190" locked="off"][et_pb_row admin_label="Fila" _builder_version="4.9.4" min_height="130px" custom_margin="3px|auto||auto||" custom_padding="2px||0px|||" collapsed="off"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.4" _dynamic_attributes="link_option_url" custom_padding="|||" link_option_url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjI1MiJ9fQ==@" border_width_bottom="3px" border_color_bottom="#E09900" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _dynamic_attributes="link_option_url" text_font="Poppins|600|||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_font_size="30px" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Montserrat|800||on|||||" header_2_text_color="#000000" header_2_font_size="60px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="38px||74px|||" link_option_url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIwOTYifX0=@" header_2_font_size_tablet="40px" header_2_font_size_phone="25px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" border_width_bottom="3px" border_color_bottom="#E09900" locked="off"]

ATRACCIÓN

DE INVERSIONES

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" text_font="Poppins|500||on|||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_font_size="20px" text_letter_spacing="3px" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Montserrat|800||on|||||" header_2_text_color="#000000" header_2_font_size="60px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="center" min_height="29px" custom_margin="-45px||-11px|||" custom_padding="0px|||||" header_2_font_size_tablet="40px" header_2_font_size_phone="25px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" border_color_all="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" locked="off"]

PARA LA REGIÓN DE TARAPACÁ

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_margin="||17px|||" custom_padding="38px||19px|||"]

Chile es reconocido mundialmente por ser la economía más competitiva de América Latina, la cual ofrece una gran cantidad de oportunidades de inversión, con diferentes programas de incentivos para los inversionistas.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Products" _builder_version="4.9.4" background_image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Form-03-e1622528474677.png" min_height="405.3px" custom_margin="8px||8px||true|" custom_padding="53px||1px|||" border_color_all="#31d190" locked="off"][et_pb_row admin_label="Fila" _builder_version="3.25" min_height="130px" custom_margin="3px|auto||auto||" custom_padding="2px||0px|||" collapsed="off"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Montserrat|800||on|||||" header_2_text_color="#000000" header_2_font_size="60px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" module_alignment="right" custom_padding="4px|||||" header_2_font_size_tablet="40px" header_2_font_size_phone="25px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

ÁREAS DE INTERÉS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4" admin_label="AREA DE INTERES" _builder_version="3.25" min_height="319.3px" custom_margin="-49px|auto|-12px|auto||" [/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="TURISMO DE INTERESES ESPECIALES" button_text="LEER MÁS" button_link="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjE2MCJ9fQ==@" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Diapositiva1-7.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.4" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_transition="on" header_font_size="25px" title_text="Diapositiva1" header_line_height="4em" sticky_enabled="0"]

En el sector turístico, la Región de Tarapacá tiene una amplia oferta, destacando el turismo de bienestar y salud, con sus playas, paisajes desérticos, de altura y salares; turismo arqueológico y paleontológico en sus huellas de  dinosaurios, geoglifos, icnitas y otros vestigios de las culturas precolombinas; turismo corporativo con sus costas y su clima ideal para congresos y conferencias; y su turismo étnico cultural con las influencias quechua y aimaras y sus fiestas religiosas.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="CALIDAD DE VIDA Y TERRITORIOS INTELIGENTES" button_text="LEER MÁS" button_link="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjE1OSJ9fQ==@" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Diapositiva1-8.jpg" heading_last_edited="off|desktop" _builder_version="4.9.4" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" header_font_tablet="" header_font_phone="" header_font_last_edited="on|desktop" border_width_all_image="1px" border_color_all_image="#E5E2EB" sticky_transition="on" sticky_enabled="0" title_text="Diapositiva1" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="2em"]

La Región presenta ciertas ventajas y oportunidades para ubicarse a la vanguardia en sustentabilidad a nivel nacional y mejorar la calidad de vida de su población. La reciente creación del Centro de Economía Circular para la macrozona norte del país y su potencial en energía solar abren un panorama favorable para el desarrollo de la economía circular en la región, que además ocupa el 3er lugar a nivel latinoamericano en el Índice de Desarrollo Humano Subnacional, desarrollado por la Universidad Autónoma de Barcelona el año 2018.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="atraccion" _builder_version="4.9.4" custom_margin="-13px||-13px||true|" custom_padding="0px||1px|||" border_color_all="#31d190" locked="off"][et_pb_row admin_label="Fila" _builder_version="4.9.4" min_height="130px" custom_margin="3px|auto||auto||" custom_padding="2px||0px|||" collapsed="off"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.4" _dynamic_attributes="link_option_url" custom_padding="|||" link_option_url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjI1MiJ9fQ==@" border_width_bottom="3px" border_color_bottom="#E09900" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _dynamic_attributes="link_option_url" text_font="Poppins|600|||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_font_size="30px" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Montserrat|800||on|||||" header_2_text_color="#000000" header_2_font_size="60px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="38px||74px|||" link_option_url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIwOTYifX0=@" header_2_font_size_tablet="40px" header_2_font_size_phone="25px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" border_width_bottom="3px" border_color_bottom="#E09900" locked="off"]

ATRACCIÓN

DE INVERSIONES

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" text_font="Poppins|500||on|||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_font_size="20px" text_letter_spacing="3px" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Montserrat|800||on|||||" header_2_text_color="#000000" header_2_font_size="60px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="center" min_height="29px" custom_margin="-45px||-11px|||" custom_padding="0px|||||" header_2_font_size_tablet="40px" header_2_font_size_phone="25px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" border_color_all="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" locked="off"]

PARA LA REGIÓN DE TARAPACÁ

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_margin="||17px|||" custom_padding="38px||19px|||"]

Chile es reconocido mundialmente por ser la economía más competitiva de América Latina, la cual ofrece una gran cantidad de oportunidades de inversión, con diferentes programas de incentivos para los inversionistas.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Products" _builder_version="4.9.4" background_image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Form-03-e1622528474677.png" min_height="405.3px" custom_margin="8px||8px||true|" custom_padding="53px||1px|||" border_color_all="#31d190" locked="off"][et_pb_row admin_label="Fila" _builder_version="3.25" min_height="130px" custom_margin="3px|auto||auto||" custom_padding="2px||0px|||" collapsed="off"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Montserrat|800||on|||||" header_2_text_color="#000000" header_2_font_size="60px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" module_alignment="right" custom_padding="4px|||||" header_2_font_size_tablet="40px" header_2_font_size_phone="25px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

Desarrollo sostenible territorial mediante inversiones de impacto

01    Creación e implementación de políticas, estratégicas y planes de aceleración del desarrollo sostenible territorial mediante atracción de inversiones de impacto a sectores público y privado.

02    Diseño de ofertas de valor y carteras de oportunidades para la inversión de triple impacto.

03    Diseño y formación de agencias y capacidades territoriales para la atracción de inversiones de impacto.

04    Inteligencia y vigilancia competitiva en oportunidades de Mercado con alto potencial de inversión.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.9.7" background_enable_color="off" background_position="top_left" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins|600|||||||" text_text_color="#E6332A" text_letter_spacing="2px" text_line_height="1.2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||" header_text_align="left" header_text_color="#0E1621" header_font_size="18px" header_line_height="2em" custom_margin="0px|||||" custom_padding="7px|50px||50px||"]

Atracción y promoción de inversiones de impacto

01    Diseño e implementación de estratégias y planes de dinamización de Ecosistemas de emprendimiento, innovación e inversiones de impacto.

02    Gestión y realización de foros y encuentros empresariales y de negocios sostenibles e inversión de impacto.

03    Difusión de métodos y tecnologías de interés para la atracción de inversiones de impacto.

04    Identificación de potenciales inversionistas tecnológicos y de capitales a proyectos de inversión de impacto.

05    Asesoría y formación de emprendimientos que inicien su etapa de Escalamiento.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

item.content:encoded:

body_text_align="left" background_color="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" custom_button="on" button_bg_color="#E09900" button_border_width="0px" button_border_color="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" button_border_radius="25px" button_letter_spacing="2px" button_font="Poppins|500|||||||" button_alignment="right" text_orientation="right" min_height="536px" custom_margin="12px|||||" custom_padding="11px||0px|||" auto="on" auto_ignore_hover="on" link_option_url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjI0OTAifX0=@"][et_pb_slide heading="ATTRACTION OF INVESTMENTS" button_text="WHY TARAPACÁ" button_link="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIwOTYifX0=@" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Tarapaca-Investments-01-1-e1623892754204.png" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_level="h1" header_font="Poppins|600|||||||" header_text_align="center" header_font_size="39px" header_letter_spacing="5px" header_line_height="2em" body_font="Poppins|500|||||||" body_text_align="right" custom_button="on" button_text_size="20px" button_font="Poppins|600||on|||||" button_use_icon="on" button_icon="%%40%%" text_orientation="center" sticky_transition="on"]

Chile is recognized worldwide for being the most competitive economy in Latin America, which offers a large number of investment opportunities, with different incentive programs for investors.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-log-y-amigable/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/ecofriendly-1.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="2em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-log-y-amigable//" sticky_transition="on"]

It involves a sustainable and technological outlook of the main industrial areas of the region, aiming for a transition towards renewable energy and the incorporation of interconnectivity and automatization of the productive processes. In this way, the main competitive factors of the region are based on its influential mining industry, photovoltaic energy potential, and the existing trade through the port in Iquique and Zofri.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="GREEN AND AGRITECH INDUSTRY" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-verdes-y-agritech/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Agritech.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="4em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-verdes-y-agritech/" sticky_transition="on"]

The edaphoclimatic conditions present in the region, in addition to its ecological levels, place it in an ideal position for the development of species of high nutritional value. In this way, foods such as quinoa are found in the highlands; Pica lemon, saffron and dates in the pampas; and typical marine products such as fish or shellfish, as well as others with various biotechnological applications such as microalgae.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/turismo/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Tourism.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="4em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/turismo/" sticky_transition="on"]

In the tourism industry, the Tarapacá Region has a wide offer, highlighting wellness and health tourism, with its beaches, desert landscapes, high altitude and salts; archaeological and paleontological tourism in its dinosaur footprints, geoglyphs, ichnites and other vestiges of pre-Columbian cultures; corporate tourism with its coasts and its ideal climate for congresses and conferences; its ethnic-cultural tourism with Quechua and Aymara influences and its religious festivals.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/calidad-de-vida/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/quality-1.jpg" heading_last_edited="off|desktop" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="2em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/calidad-de-vida/" header_font_tablet="" header_font_phone="" header_font_last_edited="on|desktop" border_width_all_image="1px" border_color_all_image="#E5E2EB" sticky_transition="on"]

The Region presents certain advantages and opportunities to be at the forefront of sustainability at a national level and improve the quality of life of its population. The recent creation of the Circular Economy Center for the northern macro zone of the country and its potential in solar energy opens up a favorable outlook for the development of the circular economy in the region, which also ranks 3rd in Latin America in the Human Development Index Subnational, developed by the Autonomous University of Barcelona in 2018.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

item.title: Ind. Log. y amigable
item.dc:creator: k.barrera.ordenes@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:

INDUSTRIA LOGÍSTICA Y ECOAMIGABLE

 

Involucra una mirada sostenible y tecnológica de los Principales sectores industriales de la región, buscando una transición hacia las energías renovables y la incorporación de interconectividad y automatización en los procesos productivos. De esta forma, los principales factores competitivos de la región son su importante industria minera, su potencial energético fotovoltaico y el comercio presente a través del puerto de Iquique y la Zofri.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||"]

PLANTA DE PRODUCCIÓN DE PAPEL PIEDRA

El papel piedra es un revolucionario producto, sustituto del papel o cartón convencional, presentado por el Grupo Tecnológico chino Lung Meng en 1990, producido a partir de una combinación de carbonato de calcio (CaCO3) y polietileno de alta densidad (HDPE) en el rol de resina, en una proporción que puede ir entre 80% y 20% y 60% y 40% respectivamente.

PLANTA PILOTO DE HIDRÓGENO VERDE

La coyuntura ambiental que enfrenta el planeta de cara al calentamiento global hace imperativa la transición energética a la producción limpia y que permitan lograr la descarbonización de la mayoría de las actividades económicas. El hidrogeno verde surge como como un elemento clave en la generación y almacenamiento de energía limpia en tanto su producción se acerca a cero emisiones.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/02_Ind_y_Log_Ecoamigable_AVR.pdf" button_text="DESCARGAR PROYECTO" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 3" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Diapositiva4-2.jpg" title_text="Diapositiva4" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||"]

PLANTA DESALADORA PARA ABASTECIMIENTO
DE AGUA

En la Región, a pesar del clima eminentemente árido, se produce una atractiva variedad de alimentos como tubérculos, quinua, cítricos (tropicales o subtropicales), hortalizas, especias y productos herbales, entre otros, concentrados principalmente en cinco comunas de la Provincia de Tamarugal: Pica, Pozo Almonte, La Tirana, Camiña, Huara y Colchane.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/03_Ind_y_Log_Ecoamigable_AVR.pdf" button_text="DESCARGAR PROYECTO" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 4" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_image="off" background_enable_color="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Diapositiva5-2.jpg" title_text="Diapositiva5" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||"]

CENTRO INTEGRAL DE MANEJO DE RESIDUOS

El crecimiento de la Región se sustenta del crecimiento de su tejido empresarial y capacidades productivas. En la Región de Tarapacá, existen industrias que generan una gran cantidad de residuos como por ejemplo, el rubro minero, pesquero, construcción, Zona Franca, entre otros. Sin embargo, existen muy pocas plantas de reciclaje o disposición final en la región, lo que implica altos costos de transporte por el movimiento de residuos fuera de la zona de exención arancelaria.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/04_Ind_y_Log_Ecoamigable_AVR.pdf" button_text="DESCARGAR PROYECTO" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 5" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Diapositiva6.jpg" title_text="Diapositiva6" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||"]

PLANTA DE ENSAMBLAJE DE ELECTROMOVILIDAD VEHÍCULOS MENORES

Cerca del 20% de la emisión de gases de efecto de invernadero se desprende del uso de vehículos de combustión interna, por lo que para la reducción de la huella de carbono y enfrentar las necesidades ambientales de cara al futuro se necesita reestructurar la movilidad de carga pasajeros de manera eficiente y sostenible. De cara a los retos ambientales de movilidad, el público y las empresas de producción vehicular enfrentan el desarrollo y consumo de vehículos eléctricos que puedan reemplazar los tradicionales vehículos de combustión interna.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/05_Ind_y_Log_Ecoamigable_AVR.pdf" button_text="DESCARGAR PROYECTO" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" locked="off"][/et_pb_section]

INDUSTRIAS VERDES Y AGRITECH

 

Las condiciones edafoclimáticas presentes en la región, además de sus pisos  ecológicos, la sitúan en una posición ideal para el desarrollo especies de alto valor alimentario. De esta manera, se encuentran alimentos como la quinua en el altiplano; limón de Pica, azafrán y dátiles en la pampa; y productos marinos típicos como pescados o mariscos, además de otros de diversas aplicaciones biotecnológicas como las microalgas.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" CULTIVO EN TIERRA DE DORADO

(SERIOLA LALANDI)

Consiste en la construcción de un sistema de cultivo en tierra para peces, localizado en el sector costero de la región de Tarapacá. Un estudio arrojará la localización optima en función de los costos de acceso a terrenos, energía y logística entre otros factores.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/01_Ind_verdes_agrotech_AVR.pdf" button_text="DESCARGAR PROYECTO" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 2" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Diapositiva3-5.jpg" title_text="Diapositiva3" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||"]

HUB AGRITECH DE AGRICULTURA REGENERATIVA Y CAPTURA DE CARBONO

Integrated Natural Resources, LLC ™ (INR) es una organización de consultoría y desarrollo de negocios internacionales impulsada por una misión de fondo que diseña e implementa soluciones innovadoras e integradas al desarrollo económico sustentable, incluidas las soluciones de tecnologías patentadas y las metodologías para dos de los problemas más urgentes de nuestro tiempo: el Cambio climático y la Nutrición (Humana / animal / vegetal).

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/02_Ind_verdes_agrotech_AVR.pdf" button_text="DESCARGAR PROYECTO" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 3" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Diapositiva4-3.jpg" title_text="Diapositiva4" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||"]

CENTRO DE PROCESAMIENTO DE ALIMENTOS

DEL DESIERTO

La aparición de la pandemia del COVID-19 ha limitado las cadenas internacionales de producción y logísticas en el mundo. Este hecho, según la FAO, ha puesto en valor el fortalecimiento de los Sistemas Alimentarios Territoriales y motivado el consumo de alimentos locales. Esto plantea una oportunidad de reorganización productiva del rubro de los alimentos en los territorios.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/03_Ind_verdes_agrotech_AVR.pdf" button_text="DESCARGAR PROYECTO" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 4" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Diapositiva5-3.jpg" title_text="Diapositiva5" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||"]

CULTIVO DE MICROALGAS

Es la instalación y posterior operación de una planta para producción de Spirulina sp. Se consideran las etapas necesarias para la selección, aislamiento, desarrollo y producción controlada, en biorreactores cerrados con cubierta tipo invernadero, para obtener finalmente, previo proceso, un complemento alimenticio rico en proteínas para el consumo tanto humano como animal.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/04_Ind_verdes_agrotech_AVR.pdf" button_text="DESCARGAR PROYECTO" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 5" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Diapositiva6-1.jpg" title_text="Diapositiva6" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||"]

SNACK PARA PERROS A BASE DE MICROALGAS

– ALLQU_CL

El aumento de afecciones cardiacas en perros es la principal consecuencia de la obesidad que afecta al 40% de los perros en Chile y el mundo, debido a una alimentación inadecuada. Esto provoca un aumento del colesterol y de los triglicéridos que desencadena problemas del sistema cardiovascular, diabetes y disminuyen su vida en 2,5 años generando gastos médicos importantes.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/05_Ind_verdes_agrotech_AVR.pdf" button_text="DESCARGAR PROYECTO" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" locked="off"][/et_pb_section]

item.title: Calidad de vida
item.dc:creator: k.barrera.ordenes@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:

CALIDAD DE VIDA Y TERRITORIOS INTELIGENTES

La Región presenta ciertas ventajas y oportunidades para ubicarse a la  vanguardia en sustentabilidad a nivel nacional y mejorar la calidad de vida de su población. La reciente creación del Centro de Economía Circular para la macrozona norte del país y su potencial en energía solar abren un panorama favorable para el desarrollo de la economía circular en la Región, que además ocupa el 3er lugar a nivel latinoamericano en el Índice de Desarrollo Humano Subnacional, desarrollado por la Universidad Autónoma de Barcelona el año 2018.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" header_font="Poppins||||||||"]

MI WAWA - DIGITAL CLINIC

Mi Wawa es una startup creada en 2013, que presta servicios de salud digital (Health Tech), con foco en el bienestar de la mujer durante el embarazo y el post parto. El emprendimiento, creado por Claudia Guerra, iquiqueña, matrona de profesión con un Máster en Inteligencia Artificial, surgió como un consultorio para prestar servicios de desarrollo psicosocial, salud mental y apoyo a recién nacidos, orientado a mujeres con dificultad de acceso a este tipo de servicios.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/01_Ecofriendly_AVR.pdf" button_text="DESCARGAR PROYECTO" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 2" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/quality2-1.jpg" title_text="quality2" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||"]

4D MOVIE THEATER FOR THE PROVINCE OF IQUIQUE

With the creation of a project for a cinema with 4D technology, it is sought to benefit the regional community, but also to be a center of attraction for tourists who visit the region throughout the year. 4D and 4DX technology allow an immersive and innovative experience when viewing a movie, allowing the viewer to feel part of it.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/02_Calidad_de_vida_AVR.pdf" button_text="DESCARGAR PROYECTO" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

TURISMO DE INTERESES ESPECIALES

En el sector turístico, la Región de Tarapacá tiene una amplia oferta, destacando el turismo de bienestar y salud, con sus playas, paisajes desérticos, de altura y salares; turismo arqueológico y paleontológico en sus huellas de dinosaurios, geoglifos, icnitas y otros vestigios de las culturas precolombinas; turismo corporativo con sus costas y su clima ideal para congresos y conferencias; y su turismo étnico cultural con las influencias quechua y aimaras y sus fiestas religiosas.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||"]

MUSEO ANTROPOLÓGICO REGIONAL

"DRAGÓN DE TARAPACÁ" 

Dentro de los planes de renovación y desarrollo urbano del borde costero de Iquique y de la promoción del patrimonio cultural, antropológico y natural de la Región, se ha dimensionado la construcción e implementación del Museo Antropológico Regional (MAR) Dragón de Tarapacá (Inspirado en El Cerro Dragón de Iquique).

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/01_Turismo_AVR.pdf" button_text="DESCARGAR PROYECTO" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 2" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Diapositiva3-6.jpg" title_text="Diapositiva3" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||"]

CENTRO DE INTERPRETACIÓN PALEONTOLÓGICO DE PICA

A 54 Km de la ciudad de Iquique, en la localidad de Pica, Región de Tarapacá, se encuentra la Reserva Natural de la Quebrada de Chacarillas, reconocida como una verdadera reliquia paleontológica puesto que contiene alrededor de su cuenca 5 ignitas, huellas del pasado jurásico de la zona y que dan la vista de los pasos conservados de diferentes tipos de dinosaurios característicos de Jurásico superior hasta el cretácico inferior (160-110 millones de años).

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/02_Turismo_AVR.pdf" button_text="DESCARGAR PROYECTO" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 3" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Diapositiva4-4.jpg" title_text="Diapositiva4" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_image="off" background_enable_color="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||"]

TURISMO EN REALIDAD AUMENTADA

- PUPO

Se creo como una alternativa de “Realidad aumentada” o imágenes superpuestas en smartphone, donde podrás descubrir por el camino de la Región de Tarapacá, la historia en cada rincón. Revive los hechos históricos y vivencia, en conjunto con contemplar el patrimonio arquitectónico como nunca, fotografíate junto a personajes y hechos históricos en el lugar en que ocurrieron.

item.title: POR QUÉ TARAPACÁ
item.dc:creator: k.barrera.ordenes@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" use_background_color_gradient="on" background_color_gradient_start="#e09900" background_color_gradient_end="rgba(0,0,0,0)" background_color_gradient_type="radial" hover_enabled="0" title_text="engineering-firm-46" background_image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/engineering-firm-46.png" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/pueblo-de-chuzmisa.png" title_text="pueblo de chuzmisa" align="center" force_fullwidth="on" admin_label="Imagen" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="28px||3px|||" animation_style="fade" border_radii="on|200px|200px|200px|200px" border_width_all="2px" border_color_all="#E5E2EB"][/et_pb_image][et_pb_button button_url="https://www.appchile360.cl/" url_new_window="on" button_text="DESCARGA CHILE 360°" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="20px" button_text_color="#0E1833" button_bg_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_width="0px" button_border_radius="25px" button_font="Poppins|600|||||||" box_shadow_style="preset3"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" header_font="Poppins||||||||" custom_margin="24px|||||" custom_padding="4px|19px||29px||"]

POR QUÉ TARAPACÁ

La Región de Tarapacá es un territorio, ubicada al Norte de Chile, con una extensión de 42.225,8 kilómetros cuadrados, equivalentes al 5,6% del territorio nacional, que posee una gran diversidad y riqueza natural, conformada por el Altiplano, la Pampa y la Costa, visible a través de sus yacimientos mineros, su alta radiación solar recibida, su potencial geotérmico, sus productos agrícolas únicos, sus playas y su biodiversidad, entre otros. Cuenta, además, con un variado y rico patrimonio cultural, destacando manifestaciones ligadas a la cultura aymara y quechua y a la historia de la pampa salitrera, visibles a través de sus fiestas religiosas, sus geoglifos e icnitas, sus oficinas salitreras patrimonio de la humanidad, además de la presencia del puerto de Iquique y su condición de Zona Franca que la dotan de un ecosistema de emprendimiento e innovación propicio.

Áreas de negocios de alto potencial para la Región de Tarapacá

Una vez analizados los elementos diferenciadores de la región, se identificaron cuatro áreas de negocios de alto potencial para la región sobre las cuales estructurar dichos factores. A continuación, se expone cada una de ellas, así como los diferenciadores relacionados:

  • INDUSTRIA Y LOGÍSTICA ECOAMIGABLE
  • INDUSTRIAS VERDES Y AGRITECH
  • TURISMO DE INTERESES ESPECIALES
  • CALIDAD DE VIDA Y TERRITORIOS INTELIGENTES
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_fullwidth_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/Depositphotos_179121428_ds-scaled-e1623114675412.jpg" title_text="Depositphotos_179121428_ds" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||0px|||"][/et_pb_fullwidth_image][/et_pb_section]

item.title: Green and agritech
item.dc:creator: k.barrera.ordenes@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" use_background_color_gradient="on" background_color_gradient_start="rgba(224,165,38,0.65)" background_color_gradient_end="rgba(0,0,0,0)" background_color_gradient_direction="252deg" background_color_gradient_start_position="35%" background_image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Form-03.png" module_alignment="center" min_height="641px" custom_margin="||-2px|||" custom_padding="5px||0px|||" animation_style="fade" locked="off" collapsed="on"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" use_custom_gutter="on" make_equal="on" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" width="100%"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Agritech.jpg" title_text="Agritech" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="100px|||||" filter_saturate="99%" border_width_all="3px" border_color_all="#FFFFFF" box_shadow_style="preset6"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins|500|||||||" text_letter_spacing="2px" text_line_height="2em" text_orientation="right" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="|30px||30px|false|true" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0" header_font="Poppins||||||||"]

GREEN AND AGRITECH INDUSTRY

 

The edaphoclimatic conditions present in the region, in addition to its ecological levels, place it in an ideal position for the development of species of high nutritional value. In this way, foods such as quinoa are found in the highlands; Pica lemon, saffron and dates in the pampas; and typical marine products such as fish or shellfish, as well as others with various biotechnological applications such as microalgae.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" PROJECTS" button_alignment="right" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_color="#0E1833" button_bg_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_width="1px" locked="off"][et_pb_fullwidth_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/005-SERNATUR-e1622513255877.jpg" title_text="005 SERNATUR" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_fullwidth_image][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 1" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Agritech1.jpg" title_text="Agritech1" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="|30px||30px|false|true"]

CULTIVATION IN THE LAND OF DORADO

(seriola lalandi)

It consists of the construction of a cultivation system on the ground for fish, located in the seashore of the Tarapacá Region. A research will provide the most suitable localization in relationship to the associated admission fees of lands, power and logistics among other factors.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/01_Agritech_AVR.pdf" button_text="DOWNLOAD PROJECT" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 2" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" use_custom_gutter="on" make_equal="on" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" width="100%" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="|0px||0px|false|true"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Agritech2.jpg" title_text="Agritech2" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="|30px||30px|false|true"]

AGRITEC HUB FOR REGENERATIVE AGRICULTURE AND CARBON CAPTURE FOR THE TARAPACÁ REGION

Integrated Natural Resources is an international business development and consulting organization driven by a deep mission that designs and implements innovative and integrated solutions to sustainable economic development, including proprietary technology solutions and methodologies for two of the most pressing problems of our time: the Climate change and Nutrition (Human / animal / plant).

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/02_Agritech_AVR.pdf" button_text="DOWNLOAD PROJECT" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 3" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" use_custom_gutter="on" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" width="100%"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Agritech3.jpg" title_text="Agritech3" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="|30px||30px|false|false"]

FOOD PROCESSING CENTER FROM THE DESERT

COVID-19 Pandemic outbreak has limited the production and logistic international chains in the world. This fact, according to the FAO, has placed value on the strengthening of the food territorial systems and motivated the consumption of local foods. This can be suggested as an opportunity for a productive reorganization of the grocery industry in the same territories they belong.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/03_Agritech_AVR.pdf" button_text="DOWNLOAD PROJECT" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 4" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" use_custom_gutter="on" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" width="100%"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Agritech4.jpg" title_text="Agritech4" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||" custom_padding="|30px||30px|false|true"]

MICROALGAE CULTURE

It is the installation and subsequent operation of a plant for the production of Spirulina sp. There are different stages needed for the selection, isolation, development and controlled production, in closed bioreactors with a greenhouse-type cover. As a result, they are able to obtain, after processing, a food supplement rich in proteins for both human and animal consumption.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/04_Agritech_AVR.pdf" button_text="DOWNLOAD PROJECT" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 5" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" use_custom_gutter="on" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" width="100%"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Agritech5.jpg" title_text="Agritech5" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="|30px||30px|false|true"]

DOG SNACK MADE OF MICROALGAE - ALLQU_CL

The increase of heart diseases in dogs is the main consequence of obesity which affects 40% of the dogs in Chile and the world, due to inadequate nutrition. This causes an increment of both cholesterol and triglyceride levels, provoking cardiovascular problems, diabetes, diminishing their lives in 2.5 years, generating significant medical expenses.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/05_Agritech_AVR.pdf" button_text="DOWNLOAD PROJECT" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITOTIES

The Region presents certain advantages and opportunities to be at the forefront of sustainability at a national level and improve the quality of life of its population. The recent creation of the Circular Economy Center for the northern macro zone of the country and its potential in solar energy opens up a favorable outlook for the development of the circular economy in the region, which also ranks 3rd in Latin America in the Human Development Index Subnational, developed by the Autonomous University of Barcelona in 2018.

text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="|30px||30px|false|true"]

MI WAWA - DIGITAL CLINIC

Mi wawa is a startup created in 2013 that offers services of Health Tech, with a scope on the women welfare during the pregnancy and postpartum. The entrepreneurship was created by Claudia Guerra, who is from Iquique, and became a midwife with a Master in Artificial Intelligence. Her business was created as a consultant to offer psychosocial development services, mental health and support to newborns, focused on women who have trouble accessing this type of service.

CINEMA WITH 4D TECHNOLOGY FOR THE PROVINCE OF IQUIQUE

With the creation of a project for a cinema with 4D technology, it is sought to benefit the regional community, but also to be a center of attraction for tourists who visit the region throughout the year. 4D and 4DX technology allow an immersive and innovative experience when viewing a movie, allowing the viewer to feel part of it.

item.title: Tourism
item.dc:creator: k.barrera.ordenes@gmail.com

TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST

 

In the tourism industry, the Tarapacá Region has a wide offer, highlighting wellness and health tourism, with its beaches, desert landscapes, high altitude and salts; archaeological and paleontological tourism in its dinosaur footprints, geoglyphs, ichnites and other vestiges of pre-Columbian cultures; corporate tourism with its coasts and its ideal climate for congresses and conferences; its ethnic-cultural tourism with Quechua and Aymara influences and its religious festivals.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="|30px||30px|false|true"]

REGIONAL ANTHROPOLOGICAL MUSEUM "DRAGÓN DE TARAPACÁ"

Within the urban renewal and development plans of the coastal edge of Iquique and the promotion of the cultural, anthropological and natural heritage of the Region, the construction and implementation of the Dragon de Tarapacá Regional Anthropological Museum (MAR) has been dimensioned (Inspired by the Dragon Hill of Iquique).

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" width="100%" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="||5px|||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/01_Tourism_AVR.pdf" button_text="DOWNLOAD PROJECT" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 2" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" use_custom_gutter="on" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" width="100%" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Tourism2.jpg" title_text="Tourism2" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="|30px||30px|false|true"]

PICA PALEONTOLOGICAL INTERPRETATION CENTER

54 km from the city of Iquique, in the town of Pica, Tarapaca Region, is the Quebrada de Chacarillas Natural Reserve, recognized as a true paleontological relic since it contains around its basin 5 ignites, traces of the Jurassic past of the area and that give the view of the preserved passages of different types of dinosaurs characteristic of the Upper Jurassic until the Lower Cretaceous (160-110 million years).

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/02_Tourism_AVR.pdf" button_text="DOWNLOAD PROJECT" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 3" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" use_custom_gutter="on" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" width="100%" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Tourism3.jpg" title_text="Tourism3" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_image="off" background_enable_color="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="|30px||30px|false|true"]

TOURISM IN AUGMENTED REALITY - PUPO

It was created as an alternative to “Augmented Reality” or images superimposed on a smartphone, where you can discover the history in every corner along the way of the Tarapacá Region. Relive the historical events and experience, together with contemplating the architectural heritage as never before, photograph yourself with characters and historical events in the place where they occurred.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/03_Tourism_AVR.pdf" button_text="DOWNLOAD PROJECT" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
