item.title: POR QUÉ CHILE
item.dc:creator: k.barrera.ordenes@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Header" _builder_version="4.9.7" use_background_color_gradient="on" background_color_gradient_start="#40b5c7" background_color_gradient_end="rgba(0,0,0,0)" background_color_gradient_direction="124deg" background_color_gradient_start_position="100%" background_color_gradient_end_position="5%" background_image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/ebook-17-1.png" background_position="bottom_center" custom_padding="0vw||0px||false|" hover_enabled="0" border_color_all="#31d190" locked="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_row column_structure="3_5,2_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="8px|0px||||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" header_font="Poppins||||||||" custom_padding="44px|||||"]

POR QUÉ CHILE:

“Chile, Creando Futuro Sustentable”

 

Porque Chile ha sido exitoso en proveer enormes oportunidades en el pasado y lo seguirá haciendo en el futuro.

Las soluciones que movilizaron el crecimiento mundial del siglo XX ya no son más las que movilizarán el crecimiento del siglo XXI. Una sociedad mucho más consciente del impacto social y medioambiental exige conocer el verdadero costo de producción y su real impacto en el incremento o disminución del stock de capital a nivel local y también global. Este impacto sobre el capital, que afecta nuestra calidad de vida como sociedad, en cada una de las formas en que este se expresa (capital: humano, sociocultural, natural o medioambiental, económico, entre otros), demanda nuevas y mejores soluciones a ser implementadas, tanto desde el mercado como desde el Estado, soluciones innovadoras capaces de abordar los serios desafíos que enfrentamos hoy.

Consistentemente, Chile se encuentra en un proceso histórico, enfrentando preguntas centrales sobre gobernanza, su contrato social y modelo económico, donde las respuestas del pasado ya no son suficientes para enfrentar los desafíos de hoy. Somos un país joven, conectado al mundo, construyendo su futuro, y futuro no es sólo tecnología, futuro es conexión con la naturaleza, es vida sana, es energía limpia, es colaboración.

Pocas veces se revela a nivel global y de manera tan palpable cuando un país atraviesa un momento histórico transformador. Los chilenos estamos cambiando de paradigma, al pasar del paisaje que atrae, a personas con propósitos que atraen; de la geografía y su potencial de recursos a la innovación que mejora el uso de esos recursos; del crecimiento como meta al delicado equilibrio que llamamos calidad de vida y sostenibilidad; transitar desde lo que se recibe a lo que se aporta como país al mundo y a los que habitan esta generosa tierra.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/Fuente_Amigos-de-Chile.jpg" title_text="Fuente_Amigos de Chile" align="center" force_fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="100px||3px|||" animation_style="fade" hover_enabled="0" border_radii="on|200px|200px|200px|200px" border_width_all="2px" border_color_all="#E5E2EB" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_image][et_pb_button button_url="https://investchile.gob.cl/" url_new_window="on" button_text="INVEST IN CHILE" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="20px" button_text_color="#0E1833" button_bg_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_width="0px" button_border_radius="25px" button_font="Poppins|600|||||||" box_shadow_style="preset3"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_fullwidth_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Depositphotos_168619640_l-2015-e1623118231216.jpg" title_text="Depositphotos_168619640_l-2015" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_fullwidth_image][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Form-02-3.png" min_height="560px" custom_margin="-4px|||||" custom_padding="40px||40px||true|"][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_color="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" background_enable_image="off" width="85.9%" custom_margin="|auto|-148px|auto||" custom_padding="2px|1px|0px|||" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" header_font="Poppins||||||||" min_height="657px" custom_margin="|1px||||" custom_padding="||1px|18px||"]

POR QUÉ CHILE?

Por qué Chile está Creando Futuro, desde los chilenos de hoy, para el mundo de hoy y de mañana, creando nuevas y mejores respuestas, que nos permitan superar lo que ya hemos logrado:

 

    • Chile Top 1 en Ranking Worls Travel Awards, como Mejor destino de turismo Aventura, 2019.
    • Chile Top 1 en LatAm como país más amigable con el turismo, Foro Económico mundial 2019.
    • Chile Top 1 en LatAm como país más amigable en apertura internacional en Ranking Competitividad de Viajes y turismo, Foro Económico Mundial 2019.
    • Chile Top 1 en LatAm en Ambiente de Negocios EIU 2019-2023
    • Chile Top 1 en LatAm como País con Mayor Competitividad IDM 2020
    • Chile Top 1 en LatAm en Libertad Económica Heritage Foundation 2020
    • Chile Top 1 en LatAm en el Índice de Competitividad de Talento Global 2020 (Fuente: INSEAD, Adecco, Google).
    • Chile Top 1 en LatAm en el índice Global de Emprendimiento 2019 y el 19º a nivel mundial (GEDI).
    • Chile Top 1 en LatAm en Índice de Desarrollo Humano y lugar 42° a nivel mundial PNUD, 2019.
    • Chile Top 2 en el Ranking Global de Inversión en Energía Renovable (ERNC) 2019.
    • +US$42.147 Millones en exportaciones mineras Metálica: cobre, oro y molibdeno; y no Metálicos: Yodo, salitre y carbonato de litio. Comisión Chilena del Cobre 2018.
    • +US$352 millones en exportaciones de servicios de (TICs) a 125 mercados, un 15% de crecimiento anual, según ProChile y Aduana 2018.
    • Chile Top 2 en Nature Index, 2019 con mayor número de publicaciones e investigaciones en revistas de excelencia.
    • Chile cuenta con un territorio para el desarrollo científico y tecnológico de nivel mundial: Antártica y glaciares, astronomía, Energías renovables, Oceanografía, Sismos y volcanes.

     

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

item.content:encoded:

ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS

 

It involves a sustainable and technological outlook of the main industrial areas of the region, aiming for a transition towards renewable energy and the incorporation of interconnectivity and automatization of the productive processes. In this way, the main competitive factors of the region are based on its influential mining industry, photovoltaic energy potential, and the existing trade through the port in Iquique and Zofri.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="|30px||30px|false|true" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

STONE PAPER PRODUCTION PLANT

Stone paper is a revolutionary product, that works as a substitution of paper or conventional carton, presented by the Chinese Technological Group Lung Meng, in 1990, produced from the combination of calcium carbonate (CaCO3) and high density polyethylene (HDPE), in a proportion that can go between 80% and 20% and 60% and 40% respectively.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" GREEN HYDROGEN PLANT PILOT

The environmental situation that the planet faces toward global warming, makes it urgent the energetic transition based on clean production that allows to achieve the decarbonisation produced by most of the economical activities. Green hydrogen emerges as a key element in the generation and storage of clean energy as its production approaches zero emissions.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/02_Ecofriendly_AVR.pdf" button_text="DOWNLOAD PROJECT" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" hover_enabled="0" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 3" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" use_custom_gutter="on" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" width="100%"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/ecofriendly3.jpg" title_text="Agritech3" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="|30px||30px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

DESALINATION PLANT FOR WATER SUPPLY

Despite the eminently arid climate in the region, an attractive variety of foods is produced such as tubers, quinoa, citrus fruits (tropical or subtropical), vegetables, spices and herbal products, among others, which are concentrated mainly in five communes of the Province of Tamarugal : Pica, Pozo Almonte, La Tirana, Camiña, Huara and Colchane.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/03_Ecofriendly_AVR.pdf" button_text="DOWNLOAD PROJECT" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" hover_enabled="0" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 4" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" use_custom_gutter="on" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" width="100%"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Diapositiva5.jpg" title_text="Agritech4" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||" custom_padding="|30px||30px|false|true" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

WASTE MANAGEMENT INTEGRAL CENTER

Sustainable Waste Management for the Tarapacá Region was highlighted by the fact that in 2014 the 165 companies surveyed generated 44 thousand tons of waste, within which end-of-life tires, oils, HDPE plastics were identified as prioritized waste due to their lack of management and electrical and electronic appliances.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/04_Ecofriendly_AVR.pdf" button_text="DOWNLOAD PROJECT" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" hover_enabled="0" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Proyecto 5" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||1px|||" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" use_custom_gutter="on" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" width="100%"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/ecofriendly5.jpg" title_text="Agritech5" align="center" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" min_height="100px" height="250px" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_letter_spacing="1px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="|30px||30px|false|true" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

LOWER ELECTROMOBILITY PRODUCTION

About 20% of greenhouse gas emissions are derived from the use of internal combustion vehicles, so to reduce the carbon footprint and address environmental needs for the future, the load of passenger mobility needs to be restructured efficiently and sustainably.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||5px|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_button button_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/05_Ecofriendly_AVR.pdf" button_text="DOWNLOAD PROJECT" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="14px" button_text_color="#E5E2EB" button_bg_color="#0E1833" button_border_width="1px" button_border_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_radius="25px" custom_margin="-30px|||||" hover_enabled="0" box_shadow_style="preset2" box_shadow_color="#0E1833" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS
 
It involves a sustainable and technological outlook of the main industrial areas of the region, aiming for a transition towards renewable energy and the incorporation of interconnectivity and automatization of the productive processes. In this way, the main competitive factors of the region are based on its influential mining industry, photovoltaic energy potential, and the existing trade through the port in Iquique and Zofri.

DOWNLOAD PROJECTS
STONE PAPER PRODUCTION PLANT
Stone paper is a revolutionary product, that works as a substitution of paper or conventional carton, presented by the Chinese Technological Group Lung Meng, in 1990, produced from the combination of calcium carbonate (CaCO3) and high density polyethylene (HDPE), in a proportion that can go between 80% and 20% and 60% and 40% respectively.
DOWNLOAD PROJECT
GREEN HYDROGEN PLANT PILOT
The environmental situation that the planet faces toward global warming, makes it urgent the energetic transition based on clean production that allows to achieve the decarbonisation produced by most of the economical activities. Green hydrogen emerges as a key element in the generation and storage of clean energy as its production approaches zero emissions.
DOWNLOAD PROJECT
DESALINATION PLANT FOR WATER SUPPLY
Despite the eminently arid climate in the region, an attractive variety of foods is produced such as tubers, quinoa, citrus fruits (tropical or subtropical), vegetables, spices and herbal products, among others, which are concentrated mainly in five communes of the Province of Tamarugal : Pica, Pozo Almonte, La Tirana, Camiña, Huara and Colchane.

WASTE MANAGEMENT INTEGRAL CENTER
Sustainable Waste Management for the Tarapacá Region was highlighted by the fact that in 2014 the 165 companies surveyed generated 44 thousand tons of waste, within which end-of-life tires, oils, HDPE plastics were identified as prioritized waste due to their lack of management and electrical and electronic appliances.
DOWNLOAD PROJECT

About 20% of greenhouse gas emissions are derived from the use of internal combustion vehicles, so to reduce the carbon footprint and address environmental needs for the future, the load of passenger mobility needs to be restructured efficiently and sustainably.

item.title: WHY CHILE
item.dc:creator: k.barrera.ordenes@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Header" _builder_version="4.9.7" use_background_color_gradient="on" background_color_gradient_start="#40b5c7" background_color_gradient_end="rgba(0,0,0,0)" background_color_gradient_direction="124deg" background_color_gradient_start_position="100%" background_color_gradient_end_position="5%" background_image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/ebook-17-1.png" background_position="bottom_center" custom_padding="0vw||0px||false|" border_color_all="#31d190" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="3_5,2_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="8px|0px|14px|||"][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" header_font="Poppins||||||||" custom_padding="44px|||||"]

WHY CHILE:

“Chile, creating a sustainable future”

 

Because Chile has been successful in providing enormous opportunities in the past and will continue to do so in the future.

The solutions that mobilized the global growth of the 20th century are no longer the ones
that will mobilize the growth of the 21st century. A society that is much more aware of the
social and environmental impact requires knowing the real cost of production and its real
impact on the increase or decrease of the capital stock at a local and global level. This
impact on the capital, which affects our life quality as a society, in each of the ways in which it is expressed (capital: human, sociocultural, natural or environmental, economic, among others), demands new and better solutions to be implemented, both from the market and from the State, innovative solutions capable of addressing the serious challenges we face today.

Consistently, Chile is in a historical process, facing central questions about governance, its social contract and economic model, where the answers of the past are not enough to face the challenges of today. We are a young country, connected to the world, building its future, and the future is not only technology, the future is connected with nature, it is healthy life, it is clean energy, it is collaboration.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/Fuente_Amigos-de-Chile.jpg" title_text="Fuente_Amigos de Chile" align="center" force_fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="100px||3px|||" animation_style="fade" border_radii="on|200px|200px|200px|200px" border_width_all="2px" border_color_all="#E5E2EB"][/et_pb_image][et_pb_button button_url="https://investchile.gob.cl/" url_new_window="on" button_text="INVEST IN CHILE" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_size="20px" button_text_color="#0E1833" button_bg_color="#E5E2EB" button_border_width="0px" button_border_radius="25px" button_font="Poppins|600|||||||" hover_enabled="0" box_shadow_style="preset3" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_fullwidth_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Depositphotos_168619640_l-2015-e1623118231216.jpg" title_text="Depositphotos_168619640_l-2015" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_fullwidth_image][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Form-02-3.png" min_height="560px" custom_margin="-4px|||||" custom_padding="0px||0px||true|"][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_color="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" background_enable_image="off" width="85.9%" custom_margin="|auto|-148px|auto||" custom_padding="2px|1px|0px|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" background_enable_color="off" background_enable_image="off"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins||||||||" header_font="Poppins||||||||" min_height="657px" custom_margin="|1px||||" custom_padding="||1px|18px||"]

WHY CHILE?

Because Chile is creating the future, from the Chileans of today, for the world of today and tomorrow, creating new and better responses that allow us to overcome what we have already achieved:  

    • Chile Top 1 in Ranking World Travel Awards, as Best Adventure Tourism Destination, 2019.

    • Chile Top 1 in LatAm as the most tourism-friendly country, World Economic Forum 2019.

    • Chile Top 1 in LatAm as the friendliest country in international openings in the Travel and Tourism Competitiveness Ranking, World Economic Forum 2019.

    • Chile Top 1 in LatAm in Business Environment EIU 2019-2023

    • Chile Top 1 in LatAm as the Country with the Most Competitiveness IDM 2020

    • Chile Top 1 in LatAm in Economic Freedom Heritage Foundation 2020

    • Chile Top 1 in LatAm in the Global Talent Competitiveness Index 2020 (Source: INSEAD, Adecco, Google).

    • Chile Top 1 in LatAm in the Global Entrepreneurship Index 2019 and 19th worldwide (GEDI).

    • Chile Top 1 in LatAm in Human Development Index and 42nd place worldwide UNDP, 2019.

    • Chile Top 2 in the Global Renewable Energy Investment Ranking (ERNC) 2019.

    • + US $ 42,147 million in mining exports Metallic: copper, gold and molybdenum; and non-metallic: iodine, saltpeter and lithium carbonate. Chilean Copper Commission 2018.

    • + US $ 352 million in exports of services (ICTs) to 125 markets, a 15% annual growth, according to ProChile and Aduana 2018.

    • Chile Top 2 in Nature Index, 2019 with the highest number of publications and research in journals of excellence.

    • Chile has a world-class territory for scientific and technological development: Antarctica and glaciers, astronomy, renewable energy, oceanography, earthquakes and volcanoes.

 

    •  
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

WHY CHILE:
“Chile, creating a sustainable future”
 
Because Chile has been successful in providing enormous opportunities in the past and will continue to do so in the future.
The solutions that mobilized the global growth of the 20th century are no longer the onesthat will mobilize the growth of the 21st century. A society that is much more aware of thesocial and environmental impact requires knowing the real cost of production and its realimpact on the increase or decrease of the capital stock at a local and global level. Thisimpact on the capital, which affects our life quality as a society, in each of the ways in which it is expressed (capital: human, sociocultural, natural or environmental, economic, among others), demands new and better solutions to be implemented, both from the market and from the State, innovative solutions capable of addressing the serious challenges we face today.
Consistently, Chile is in a historical process, facing central questions about governance, its social contract and economic model, where the answers of the past are not enough to face the challenges of today. We are a young country, connected to the world, building its future, and the future is not only technology, the future is connected with nature, it is healthy life, it is clean energy, it is collaboration.
INVEST IN CHILE
WHY CHILE?

Because Chile is creating the future, from the Chileans of today, for the world of today and tomorrow, creating new and better responses that allow us to overcome what we have already achieved:  

Chile Top 1 in Ranking World Travel Awards, as Best Adventure Tourism Destination, 2019.

Chile Top 1 in LatAm as the most tourism-friendly country, World Economic Forum 2019.

Chile Top 1 in LatAm in Business Environment EIU 2019-2023

Chile Top 1 in LatAm as the Country with the Most Competitiveness IDM 2020

Chile Top 1 in LatAm in Economic Freedom Heritage Foundation 2020

Chile Top 1 in LatAm in the Global Talent Competitiveness Index 2020 (Source: INSEAD, Adecco, Google).

Chile Top 1 in LatAm in the Global Entrepreneurship Index 2019 and 19th worldwide (GEDI).

Chile Top 1 in LatAm in Human Development Index and 42nd place worldwide UNDP, 2019.

WHY TARAPACÁ

The Tarapacá region is a territory located in the north of Chile, with an extension of 42.225,8 square kilometres that are equal to the 5,6 % of the national territory, which has a great diversity and natural wealth, made up of the Altiplano, the Pampas and the Coast, which can be seen through its mine site, its high solar radiation, geothermal potential, its unique organic products, the beaches that can be found and its biodiversity among others. In addition, it has a varied and rich cultural heritage, highlighting manifestations linked to the Aymara and Quechua culture and the history of the Saltpetre Pampa, that are related through its religious festivities, geoglyphs and icnitas. Its salpetre offices, considered as a world heritage site, besides to the presence of the port of Iquique and its status as a Free Zone that entitle it with a entrepreneurship and innovation unique Ecosystem.

High potential business areas for the Tarapacá Region

Once the differentiating elements for the region have been analyzed, four high potential business areas were identified for the region, upon these facts will be structured. Next, each of them will be described:

  • SMARTGREEN INDUSTRY
  • FOOD IN THE COAST, PAMPA AND HIGHLANDS
  • SPECIAL INTERESTS TOURISM: SEA, DESERT AND HIGHLANDS
  • LIFE QUALITY AND SUSTAINABILITY
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_margin="-28px|||||"][et_pb_fullwidth_image src="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/Depositphotos_179121428_ds-scaled-e1623114675412.jpg" title_text="Depositphotos_179121428_ds" _builder_version="4.9.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="||0px|||"][/et_pb_fullwidth_image][/et_pb_section]

image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Tarapaca-Investments-01-1-e1623892754204.png" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_level="h1" header_font="Poppins|600|||||||" header_text_align="center" header_font_size="39px" header_letter_spacing="5px" header_line_height="2em" body_font="Poppins|500|||||||" body_text_align="right" custom_button="on" button_text_size="20px" button_font="Poppins|600||on|||||" button_use_icon="on" button_icon="%%40%%" text_orientation="center" hover_enabled="0" sticky_transition="on" sticky_enabled="0"]

Chile is recognized worldwide for being the most competitive economy in Latin America, which offers a large number of investment opportunities, with different incentive programs for investors.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-log-y-amigable/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/ecofriendly-1.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="2em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-log-y-amigable//" hover_enabled="0" sticky_transition="on" sticky_enabled="0"]

It involves a sustainable and technological outlook of the main industrial areas of the region, aiming for a transition towards renewable energy and the incorporation of interconnectivity and automatization of the productive processes. In this way, the main competitive factors of the region are based on its influential mining industry, photovoltaic energy potential, and the existing trade through the port in Iquique and Zofri.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="GREEN AND AGRITECH INDUSTRY" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-verdes-y-agritech/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Agritech.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="4em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-verdes-y-agritech/" hover_enabled="0" sticky_transition="on" sticky_enabled="0"]

The edaphoclimatic conditions present in the region, in addition to its ecological levels, place it in an ideal position for the development of species of high nutritional value. In this way, foods such as quinoa are found in the highlands; Pica lemon, saffron and dates in the pampas; and typical marine products such as fish or shellfish, as well as others with various biotechnological applications such as microalgae.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/turismo/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Tourism.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="4em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/turismo/" hover_enabled="0" sticky_transition="on" sticky_enabled="0"]

In the tourism industry, the Tarapacá Region has a wide offer, highlighting wellness and health tourism, with its beaches, desert landscapes, high altitude and salts; archaeological and paleontological tourism in its dinosaur footprints, geoglyphs, ichnites and other vestiges of pre-Columbian cultures; corporate tourism with its coasts and its ideal climate for congresses and conferences; its ethnic-cultural tourism with Quechua and Aymara influences and its religious festivals.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/calidad-de-vida/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/quality-1.jpg" heading_last_edited="off|desktop" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="2em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/calidad-de-vida/" hover_enabled="0" header_font_tablet="" header_font_phone="" header_font_last_edited="on|desktop" border_width_all_image="1px" border_color_all_image="#E5E2EB" sticky_transition="on" sticky_enabled="0"]

The Region presents certain advantages and opportunities to be at the forefront of sustainability at a national level and improve the quality of life of its population. The recent creation of the Circular Economy Center for the northern macro zone of the country and its potential in solar energy opens up a favorable outlook for the development of the circular economy in the region, which also ranks 3rd in Latin America in the Human Development Index Subnational, developed by the Autonomous University of Barcelona in 2018.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="atraccion" _builder_version="4.9.7" background_color="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" background_image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Form-03-4.png" custom_margin="-13px||-13px||true|" custom_padding="0px||23px|||" border_color_all="#31d190" locked="off"][et_pb_row admin_label="Fila" _builder_version="4.9.7" min_height="130px" custom_margin="3px|auto||auto||" custom_padding="2px||0px|||" collapsed="off"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="link_option_url" background_color="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" background_enable_image="off" custom_padding="|||" link_option_url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjI1MiJ9fQ==@" border_width_bottom="3px" border_color_bottom="#E09900" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.7" text_font="Poppins|600|||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_font_size="25px" text_letter_spacing="10px" header_font="Poppins||||||||" header_font_size="25px" header_letter_spacing="10px" header_2_font="Poppins|800||on|||||" header_2_text_color="#000000" header_2_font_size="60px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" header_3_font="Poppins||||||||" header_3_font_size="25px" header_4_font="Poppins||||||||" header_4_font_size="22px" background_enable_image="off" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="38px||74px||false|false" custom_padding="0px||0px|||" header_2_font_size_tablet="40px" header_2_font_size_phone="25px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" border_width_bottom="3px" border_color_bottom="#E09900" locked="off"]

Chile is recognized worldwide for being the most competitive economy in Latin America, which offers a large number of investment opportunities, with different incentive programs for investors.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Products" _builder_version="4.9.4" background_image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Form-03-e1622528474677.png" min_height="405.3px" custom_margin="8px||8px||true|" custom_padding="53px||1px|||" border_color_all="#31d190" locked="off"][et_pb_row admin_label="Fila" _builder_version="4.9.7" min_height="130px" custom_margin="3px|auto||auto||" custom_padding="2px||0px|||" collapsed="off"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" background_color="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" background_enable_image="off" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.7" text_font="Poppins||||||||" header_font="Poppins||||||||" header_2_font="Montserrat|800||on|||||" header_2_text_color="#000000" header_2_font_size="60px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" module_alignment="right" custom_padding="4px|||||" header_2_font_size_tablet="40px" header_2_font_size_phone="25px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

item.dc:creator: k.barrera.ordenes@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:

body_text_align="left" background_color="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" custom_button="on" button_bg_color="#E09900" button_border_width="0px" button_border_color="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" button_border_radius="25px" button_letter_spacing="2px" button_font="Poppins|500|||||||" button_alignment="right" text_orientation="right" min_height="536px" custom_margin="12px|||||" custom_padding="11px||0px|||" auto="on" auto_ignore_hover="on" link_option_url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjI0OTAifX0=@"][et_pb_slide heading="ATRACCIÓN DE INVERSIONES" button_text="POR QUÉ TARAPACÁ" button_link="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIwOTYifX0=@" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Tarapaca-Investments-01-1-e1623892754204.png" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_level="h1" header_font="Poppins|600|||||||" header_text_align="center" header_font_size="39px" header_letter_spacing="5px" header_line_height="1.5em" body_font="Poppins|500|||||||" body_text_align="right" custom_button="on" button_text_size="20px" button_font="Poppins|600||on|||||" button_use_icon="on" button_icon="%%40%%" text_orientation="center" sticky_transition="on"]

Chile es reconocido mundialmente por ser la economía más competitiva de América Latina, la cual ofrece una gran cantidad de oportunidades de inversión, con diferentes programas de incentivos para los inversionistas.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="INDUSTRIA Y LOGÍSTICA ECOAMIGABLE" button_text="LEER MÁS" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/en/opportunity/eco-friendly-ind" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/ecoamigable-1.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="1.5em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/en/opportunity/eco-friendly-ind/" sticky_transition="on"]

Involucra una mirada sostenible y tecnológica de los Principales sectores industriales de la región, buscando una transición hacia las energías renovables y la incorporación de interconectividad y automatización en los procesos productivos. De esta forma, los principales factores competitivos de la región con su importante industria minera, su potencial energético fotovoltaico y el comercio presente a través del puerto de Iquique y la Zofri.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="INDUSTRIAS VERDES Y AGRITECH" button_text="LEER MÁS" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-verdes-y-agritech/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Agritech-2.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="1.5em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-verdes-y-agritech/" sticky_transition="on"]

Las condiciones edafoclimáticas presentes en la región, además de sus pisos ecológicos, la sitúan en una posición ideal para el desarrollo especies de alto valor alimentario. De esta manera, se encuentran alimentos como la quinua en el altiplano; limón de Pica, azafrán y dátiles en la pampa; y productos marinos típicos como pescados o mariscos, además de otros de diversas aplicaciones biotecnológicas como las microalgas.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="TURISMO DE INTERESES ESPECIALES" button_text="LEER MÁS" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/turismo/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/turismo.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="4em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/turismo/" sticky_transition="on"]

En el sector turístico, la Región de Tarapacá tiene una amplia oferta, destacando el turismo de bienestar y salud, con sus playas, paisajes desérticos, de altura y salares; turismo arqueológico y paleontológico en sus huellas de dinosaurios, geoglifos, icnitas y otros vestigios de las culturas precolombinas; turismo corporativo con sus costas y su clima ideal para congresos y conferencias; y su turismo étnico cultural con las influencias quechua y aimaras y sus fiestas religiosas.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="CALIDAD DE VIDA Y TERRITORIOS INTELIGENTES" button_text="LEER MÁS" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/calidad-de-vida/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Calidad-1.jpg" heading_last_edited="off|desktop" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="1.5em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/calidad-de-vida/" header_font_tablet="" header_font_phone="" header_font_last_edited="on|desktop" border_width_all_image="1px" border_color_all_image="#E5E2EB" sticky_transition="on"]

La Región presenta ciertas ventajas y oportunidades para ubicarse a la vanguardia en sustentabilidad a nivel nacional y
mejorar la calidad de vida de su población. La reciente creación del Centro de Economía Circular para la macrozona
norte del país y su potencial en energía solar abren un panorama favorable para el desarrollo de la economía circular en la región, que además ocupa el 3er lugar a nivel latinoamericano en el Índice de Desarrollo Humano Subnacional, desarrollado por la Universidad Autónoma de Barcelona el año 2018.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="atraccion" _builder_version="4.9.7" background_color="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" background_image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Form-03-4.png" custom_margin="-13px||-13px||true|" custom_padding="0px||23px|||" border_color_all="#31d190" locked="off"][et_pb_row admin_label="Fila" _builder_version="4.9.7" min_height="130px" custom_margin="3px|auto||auto||" custom_padding="2px||0px|||" collapsed="off"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="link_option_url" background_color="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" background_enable_image="off" custom_padding="|||" link_option_url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjI1MiJ9fQ==@" border_width_bottom="3px" border_color_bottom="#E09900" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.7" text_font="Poppins|600|||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_font_size="25px" text_letter_spacing="10px" header_font="Poppins||||||||" header_font_size="25px" header_letter_spacing="10px" header_2_font="Poppins|800||on|||||" header_2_text_color="#000000" header_2_font_size="60px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" header_3_font="Poppins||||||||" header_3_font_size="25px" header_4_font="Poppins||||||||" header_4_font_size="22px" background_enable_image="off" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="38px||74px||false|false" custom_padding="0px||0px|||" header_2_font_size_tablet="40px" header_2_font_size_phone="25px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" border_width_bottom="3px" border_color_bottom="#E09900" locked="off"]

ATRACCIÓN DE INVERSIONES

PARA LA REGIÓN DE TARAPACÁ

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
ATRACCIÓN DE INVERSIONES

Chile es reconocido mundialmente por ser la economía más competitiva de América Latina, la cual ofrece una gran cantidad de oportunidades de inversión, con diferentes programas de incentivos para los inversionistas.

POR QUÉ TARAPACÁ

INDUSTRIA Y LOGÍSTICA ECOAMIGABLE

Involucra una mirada sostenible y tecnológica de los Principales sectores industriales de la región, buscando una transición hacia las energías renovables y la incorporación de interconectividad y automatización en los procesos productivos. De esta forma, los principales factores competitivos de la región con su importante industria minera, su potencial energético fotovoltaico y el comercio presente a través del puerto de Iquique y la Zofri.
LEER MÁS

INDUSTRIAS VERDES Y AGRITECH

Las condiciones edafoclimáticas presentes en la región, además de sus pisos ecológicos, la sitúan en una posición ideal para el desarrollo especies de alto valor alimentario. De esta manera, se encuentran alimentos como la quinua en el altiplano; limón de Pica, azafrán y dátiles en la pampa; y productos marinos típicos como pescados o mariscos, además de otros de diversas aplicaciones biotecnológicas como las microalgas.
LEER MÁS

TURISMO DE INTERESES ESPECIALES

En el sector turístico, la Región de Tarapacá tiene una amplia oferta, destacando el turismo de bienestar y salud, con sus playas, paisajes desérticos, de altura y salares; turismo arqueológico y paleontológico en sus huellas de dinosaurios, geoglifos, icnitas y otros vestigios de las culturas precolombinas; turismo corporativo con sus costas y su clima ideal para congresos y conferencias; y su turismo étnico cultural con las influencias quechua y aimaras y sus fiestas religiosas.
LEER MÁS

CALIDAD DE VIDA Y TERRITORIOS INTELIGENTES

La Región presenta ciertas ventajas y oportunidades para ubicarse a la vanguardia en sustentabilidad a nivel nacional ymejorar la calidad de vida de su población. La reciente creación del Centro de Economía Circular para la macrozonanorte del país y su potencial en energía solar abren un panorama favorable para el desarrollo de la economía circular en la región, que además ocupa el 3er lugar a nivel latinoamericano en el Índice de Desarrollo Humano Subnacional, desarrollado por la Universidad Autónoma de Barcelona el año 2018.
LEER MÁS
ATRACCIÓN DE INVERSIONES
PARA LA REGIÓN DE TARAPACÁ
Chile es reconocido mundialmente por ser la economía más competitiva deAmérica Latina, la cual ofrece una gran cantidad de oportunidades deinversión, con diferentes programas de incentivos para los inversionistas.
AREAS DE INTERÉS

INDUSTRIA Y LOGÍSTICA ECOAMIGABLE

INDUSTRIAS VERDES Y AGRITECH

TURISMO DE INTERESES ESPECIALES

CALIDAD DE VIDA Y TERRITORIOS INTELIGENTES

ATRACCIÓN DE INVERSIONES

Chile es reconocido mundialmente por ser la economía más competitiva de América Latina, la cual ofrece una gran cantidad de oportunidades de inversión, con diferentes programas de incentivos para los inversionistas.

POR QUÉ TARAPACÁ

INDUSTRIA Y LOGÍSTICA ECOAMIGABLE

Involucra una mirada sostenible y tecnológica de los Principales sectores industriales de la región, buscando una transición hacia las energías renovables y la incorporación de interconectividad y automatización en los procesos productivos. De esta forma, los principales factores competitivos de la región con su importante industria minera, su potencial energético fotovoltaico y el comercio presente a través del puerto de Iquique y la Zofri.
LEER MÁS

INDUSTRIAS VERDES Y AGRITECH

Las condiciones edafoclimáticas presentes en la región, además de sus pisos ecológicos, la sitúan en una posición ideal para el desarrollo especies de alto valor alimentario. De esta manera, se encuentran alimentos como la quinua en el altiplano; limón de Pica, azafrán y dátiles en la pampa; y productos marinos típicos como pescados o mariscos, además de otros de diversas aplicaciones biotecnológicas como las microalgas.
LEER MÁS

TURISMO DE INTERESES ESPECIALES

En el sector turístico, la Región de Tarapacá tiene una amplia oferta, destacando el turismo de bienestar y salud, con sus playas, paisajes desérticos, de altura y salares; turismo arqueológico y paleontológico en sus huellas de dinosaurios, geoglifos, icnitas y otros vestigios de las culturas precolombinas; turismo corporativo con sus costas y su clima ideal para congresos y conferencias; y su turismo étnico cultural con las influencias quechua y aimaras y sus fiestas religiosas.
LEER MÁS

CALIDAD DE VIDA Y TERRITORIOS INTELIGENTES

La Región presenta ciertas ventajas y oportunidades para ubicarse a la vanguardia en sustentabilidad a nivel nacional ymejorar la calidad de vida de su población. La reciente creación del Centro de Economía Circular para la macrozonanorte del país y su potencial en energía solar abren un panorama favorable para el desarrollo de la economía circular en la región, que además ocupa el 3er lugar a nivel latinoamericano en el Índice de Desarrollo Humano Subnacional, desarrollado por la Universidad Autónoma de Barcelona el año 2018.
LEER MÁS
ATRACCIÓN DE INVERSIONES
PARA LA REGIÓN DE TARAPACÁ
Chile es reconocido mundialmente por ser la economía más competitiva deAmérica Latina, la cual ofrece una gran cantidad de oportunidades deinversión, con diferentes programas de incentivos para los inversionistas.
AREAS DE INTERÉS

sticky_transition="on" sticky_enabled="0"]

Chile is recognized worldwide for being the most competitive economy in Latin America, which offers a large number of investment opportunities, with different incentive programs for investors.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-log-y-amigable/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/ecofriendly-1.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="2em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-log-y-amigable//" hover_enabled="0" sticky_transition="on" sticky_enabled="0"]

It involves a sustainable and technological outlook of the main industrial areas of the region, aiming for a transition towards renewable energy and the incorporation of interconnectivity and automatization of the productive processes. In this way, the main competitive factors of the region are based on its influential mining industry, photovoltaic energy potential, and the existing trade through the port in Iquique and Zofri.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="GREEN AND AGRITECH INDUSTRY" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-verdes-y-agritech/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Agritech.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="4em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-verdes-y-agritech/" hover_enabled="0" sticky_transition="on" sticky_enabled="0"]

The edaphoclimatic conditions present in the region, in addition to its ecological levels, place it in an ideal position for the development of species of high nutritional value. In this way, foods such as quinoa are found in the highlands; Pica lemon, saffron and dates in the pampas; and typical marine products such as fish or shellfish, as well as others with various biotechnological applications such as microalgae.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/turismo/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Tourism.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="4em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/turismo/" hover_enabled="0" sticky_transition="on" sticky_enabled="0"]

In the tourism industry, the Tarapacá Region has a wide offer, highlighting wellness and health tourism, with its beaches, desert landscapes, high altitude and salts; archaeological and paleontological tourism in its dinosaur footprints, geoglyphs, ichnites and other vestiges of pre-Columbian cultures; corporate tourism with its coasts and its ideal climate for congresses and conferences; its ethnic-cultural tourism with Quechua and Aymara influences and its religious festivals.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/calidad-de-vida/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/quality-1.jpg" heading_last_edited="off|desktop" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="2em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/calidad-de-vida/" hover_enabled="0" header_font_tablet="" header_font_phone="" header_font_last_edited="on|desktop" border_width_all_image="1px" border_color_all_image="#E5E2EB" sticky_transition="on" sticky_enabled="0"]

The Region presents certain advantages and opportunities to be at the forefront of sustainability at a national level and improve the quality of life of its population. The recent creation of the Circular Economy Center for the northern macro zone of the country and its potential in solar energy opens up a favorable outlook for the development of the circular economy in the region, which also ranks 3rd in Latin America in the Human Development Index Subnational, developed by the Autonomous University of Barcelona in 2018.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="atraccion" _builder_version="4.9.7" background_color="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" background_image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Form-03-4.png" custom_margin="-13px||-13px||true|" custom_padding="0px||23px|||" border_color_all="#31d190" locked="off"][et_pb_row admin_label="Fila" _builder_version="4.9.7" min_height="130px" custom_margin="3px|auto||auto||" custom_padding="2px||0px|||" collapsed="off"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="link_option_url" background_color="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" background_enable_image="off" custom_padding="|||" link_option_url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjI1MiJ9fQ==@" border_width_bottom="3px" border_color_bottom="#E09900" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.7" text_font="Poppins|600|||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_font_size="25px" text_letter_spacing="10px" header_font="Poppins||||||||" header_font_size="25px" header_letter_spacing="10px" header_2_font="Poppins|800||on|||||" header_2_text_color="#000000" header_2_font_size="60px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" header_3_font="Poppins||||||||" header_3_font_size="25px" header_4_font="Poppins||||||||" header_4_font_size="22px" background_enable_image="off" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="38px||74px||false|false" custom_padding="0px||0px|||" header_2_font_size_tablet="40px" header_2_font_size_phone="25px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" border_width_bottom="3px" border_color_bottom="#E09900" locked="off"]

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-log-y-amigable/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/ecofriendly-1.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="2em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-log-y-amigable//" sticky_transition="on"]

It involves a sustainable and technological outlook of the main industrial areas of the region, aiming for a transition towards renewable energy and the incorporation of interconnectivity and automatization of the productive processes. In this way, the main competitive factors of the region are based on its influential mining industry, photovoltaic energy potential, and the existing trade through the port in Iquique and Zofri.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="GREEN AND AGRITECH INDUSTRY" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-verdes-y-agritech/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Agritech.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="4em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-verdes-y-agritech/" sticky_transition="on"]

The edaphoclimatic conditions present in the region, in addition to its ecological levels, place it in an ideal position for the development of species of high nutritional value. In this way, foods such as quinoa are found in the highlands; Pica lemon, saffron and dates in the pampas; and typical marine products such as fish or shellfish, as well as others with various biotechnological applications such as microalgae.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/turismo/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Tourism.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="4em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/turismo/" sticky_transition="on"]

In the tourism industry, the Tarapacá Region has a wide offer, highlighting wellness and health tourism, with its beaches, desert landscapes, high altitude and salts; archaeological and paleontological tourism in its dinosaur footprints, geoglyphs, ichnites and other vestiges of pre-Columbian cultures; corporate tourism with its coasts and its ideal climate for congresses and conferences; its ethnic-cultural tourism with Quechua and Aymara influences and its religious festivals.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/calidad-de-vida/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/quality-1.jpg" heading_last_edited="off|desktop" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="2em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/calidad-de-vida/" header_font_tablet="" header_font_phone="" header_font_last_edited="on|desktop" border_width_all_image="1px" border_color_all_image="#E5E2EB" sticky_transition="on"]

The Region presents certain advantages and opportunities to be at the forefront of sustainability at a national level and improve the quality of life of its population. The recent creation of the Circular Economy Center for the northern macro zone of the country and its potential in solar energy opens up a favorable outlook for the development of the circular economy in the region, which also ranks 3rd in Latin America in the Human Development Index Subnational, developed by the Autonomous University of Barcelona in 2018.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
ATTRACTION OF INVESTMENTS

Chile is recognized worldwide for being the most competitive economy in Latin America, which offers a large number of investment opportunities, with different incentive programs for investors.

WHY TARAPACÁ

ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS

It involves a sustainable and technological outlook of the main industrial areas of the region, aiming for a transition towards renewable energy and the incorporation of interconnectivity and automatization of the productive processes. In this way, the main competitive factors of the region are based on its influential mining industry, photovoltaic energy potential, and the existing trade through the port in Iquique and Zofri.

READ MORE

GREEN AND AGRITECH INDUSTRY

The edaphoclimatic conditions present in the region, in addition to its ecological levels, place it in an ideal position for the development of species of high nutritional value. In this way, foods such as quinoa are found in the highlands; Pica lemon, saffron and dates in the pampas; and typical marine products such as fish or shellfish, as well as others with various biotechnological applications such as microalgae.

READ MORE

TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST

In the tourism industry, the Tarapacá Region has a wide offer, highlighting wellness and health tourism, with its beaches, desert landscapes, high altitude and salts; archaeological and paleontological tourism in its dinosaur footprints, geoglyphs, ichnites and other vestiges of pre-Columbian cultures; corporate tourism with its coasts and its ideal climate for congresses and conferences; its ethnic-cultural tourism with Quechua and Aymara influences and its religious festivals.

READ MORE

LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES

The Region presents certain advantages and opportunities to be at the forefront of sustainability at a national level and improve the quality of life of its population. The recent creation of the Circular Economy Center for the northern macro zone of the country and its potential in solar energy opens up a favorable outlook for the development of the circular economy in the region, which also ranks 3rd in Latin America in the Human Development Index Subnational, developed by the Autonomous University of Barcelona in 2018.

READ MORE

The Region presents certain advantages and opportunities to be at the forefront of sustainability at a national level and improve the quality of life of its population. The recent creation of the Circular Economy Center for the northern macro zone of the country and its potential in solar energy opens up a favorable outlook for the development of the circular economy in the region, which also ranks 3rd in Latin America in the Human Development Index Subnational, developed by the Autonomous University of Barcelona in 2018.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
ATTRACTION OF INVESTMENTS

Chile is recognized worldwide for being the most competitive economy in Latin America, which offers a large number of investment opportunities, with different incentive programs for investors.

WHY TARAPACÁ

ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS

It involves a sustainable and technological outlook of the main industrial areas of the region, aiming for a transition towards renewable energy and the incorporation of interconnectivity and automatization of the productive processes. In this way, the main competitive factors of the region are based on its influential mining industry, photovoltaic energy potential, and the existing trade through the port in Iquique and Zofri.
READ MORE

GREEN AND AGRITECH INDUSTRY

The edaphoclimatic conditions present in the region, in addition to its ecological levels, place it in an ideal position for the development of species of high nutritional value. In this way, foods such as quinoa are found in the highlands; Pica lemon, saffron and dates in the pampas; and typical marine products such as fish or shellfish, as well as others with various biotechnological applications such as microalgae.
READ MORE

TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST

In the tourism industry, the Tarapacá Region has a wide offer, highlighting wellness and health tourism, with its beaches, desert landscapes, high altitude and salts; archaeological and paleontological tourism in its dinosaur footprints, geoglyphs, ichnites and other vestiges of pre-Columbian cultures; corporate tourism with its coasts and its ideal climate for congresses and conferences; its ethnic-cultural tourism with Quechua and Aymara influences and its religious festivals.
READ MORE

LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES

The Region presents certain advantages and opportunities to be at the forefront of sustainability at a national level and improve the quality of life of its population. The recent creation of the Circular Economy Center for the northern macro zone of the country and its potential in solar energy opens up a favorable outlook for the development of the circular economy in the region, which also ranks 3rd in Latin America in the Human Development Index Subnational, developed by the Autonomous University of Barcelona in 2018.
READ MORE

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
ATTRACTION OF INVESTMENTS

Chile is recognized worldwide for being the most competitive economy in Latin America, which offers a large number of investment opportunities, with different incentive programs for investors.

WHY TARAPACÁ

ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS

It involves a sustainable and technological outlook of the main industrial areas of the region, aiming for a transition towards renewable energy and the incorporation of interconnectivity and automatization of the productive processes. In this way, the main competitive factors of the region are based on its influential mining industry, photovoltaic energy potential, and the existing trade through the port in Iquique and Zofri.
READ MORE

GREEN AND AGRITECH INDUSTRY

The edaphoclimatic conditions present in the region, in addition to its ecological levels, place it in an ideal position for the development of species of high nutritional value. In this way, foods such as quinoa are found in the highlands; Pica lemon, saffron and dates in the pampas; and typical marine products such as fish or shellfish, as well as others with various biotechnological applications such as microalgae.
READ MORE

TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST

In the tourism industry, the Tarapacá Region has a wide offer, highlighting wellness and health tourism, with its beaches, desert landscapes, high altitude and salts; archaeological and paleontological tourism in its dinosaur footprints, geoglyphs, ichnites and other vestiges of pre-Columbian cultures; corporate tourism with its coasts and its ideal climate for congresses and conferences; its ethnic-cultural tourism with Quechua and Aymara influences and its religious festivals.
READ MORE

LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES

The Region presents certain advantages and opportunities to be at the forefront of sustainability at a national level and improve the quality of life of its population. The recent creation of the Circular Economy Center for the northern macro zone of the country and its potential in solar energy opens up a favorable outlook for the development of the circular economy in the region, which also ranks 3rd in Latin America in the Human Development Index Subnational, developed by the Autonomous University of Barcelona in 2018.
READ MORE
INVESTMENT
ATTRACTION
FOR THE TARAPACÁ REGION
Chile is recognized worldwide for being the most competitive economy in Latin America, which offers a large number of investment opportunities, with different incentive programs for investors.
AREAS OF INTEREST

ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS

GREEN AND AGRITECH INDUSTRY

TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST

LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
ATTRACTION OF INVESTMENTS

Chile is recognized worldwide for being the most competitive economy in Latin America, which offers a large number of investment opportunities, with different incentive programs for investors.

WHY TARAPACÁ

ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS

It involves a sustainable and technological outlook of the main industrial areas of the region, aiming for a transition towards renewable energy and the incorporation of interconnectivity and automatization of the productive processes. In this way, the main competitive factors of the region are based on its influential mining industry, photovoltaic energy potential, and the existing trade through the port in Iquique and Zofri.
READ MORE

GREEN AND AGRITECH INDUSTRY

The edaphoclimatic conditions present in the region, in addition to its ecological levels, place it in an ideal position for the development of species of high nutritional value. In this way, foods such as quinoa are found in the highlands; Pica lemon, saffron and dates in the pampas; and typical marine products such as fish or shellfish, as well as others with various biotechnological applications such as microalgae.
READ MORE

TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST

In the tourism industry, the Tarapacá Region has a wide offer, highlighting wellness and health tourism, with its beaches, desert landscapes, high altitude and salts; archaeological and paleontological tourism in its dinosaur footprints, geoglyphs, ichnites and other vestiges of pre-Columbian cultures; corporate tourism with its coasts and its ideal climate for congresses and conferences; its ethnic-cultural tourism with Quechua and Aymara influences and its religious festivals.
READ MORE

LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES

The Region presents certain advantages and opportunities to be at the forefront of sustainability at a national level and improve the quality of life of its population. The recent creation of the Circular Economy Center for the northern macro zone of the country and its potential in solar energy opens up a favorable outlook for the development of the circular economy in the region, which also ranks 3rd in Latin America in the Human Development Index Subnational, developed by the Autonomous University of Barcelona in 2018.
READ MORE
INVESTMENT
ATTRACTION
FOR THE TARAPACÁ REGION
Chile is recognized worldwide for being the most competitive economy in Latin America, which offers a large number of investment opportunities, with different incentive programs for investors.
AREAS OF INTEREST

ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS

GREEN AND AGRITECH INDUSTRY

TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST

LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES

TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST

LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES

ATTRACTION OF INVESTMENTS

Chile is recognized worldwide for being the most competitive economy in Latin America, which offers a large number of investment opportunities, with different incentive programs for investors.

WHY TARAPACÁ

ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS

It involves a sustainable and technological outlook of the main industrial areas of the region, aiming for a transition towards renewable energy and the incorporation of interconnectivity and automatization of the productive processes. In this way, the main competitive factors of the region are based on its influential mining industry, photovoltaic energy potential, and the existing trade through the port in Iquique and Zofri.
READ MORE

GREEN AND AGRITECH INDUSTRY

The edaphoclimatic conditions present in the region, in addition to its ecological levels, place it in an ideal position for the development of species of high nutritional value. In this way, foods such as quinoa are found in the highlands; Pica lemon, saffron and dates in the pampas; and typical marine products such as fish or shellfish, as well as others with various biotechnological applications such as microalgae.
READ MORE

TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST

In the tourism industry, the Tarapacá Region has a wide offer, highlighting wellness and health tourism, with its beaches, desert landscapes, high altitude and salts; archaeological and paleontological tourism in its dinosaur footprints, geoglyphs, ichnites and other vestiges of pre-Columbian cultures; corporate tourism with its coasts and its ideal climate for congresses and conferences; its ethnic-cultural tourism with Quechua and Aymara influences and its religious festivals.
READ MORE

LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES

The Region presents certain advantages and opportunities to be at the forefront of sustainability at a national level and improve the quality of life of its population. The recent creation of the Circular Economy Center for the northern macro zone of the country and its potential in solar energy opens up a favorable outlook for the development of the circular economy in the region, which also ranks 3rd in Latin America in the Human Development Index Subnational, developed by the Autonomous University of Barcelona in 2018.
READ MORE
INVESTMENT
ATTRACTION
FOR THE TARAPACÁ REGION
Chile is recognized worldwide for being the most competitive economy in Latin America, which offers a large number of investment opportunities, with different incentive programs for investors.
AREAS OF INTEREST

ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS

GREEN AND AGRITECH INDUSTRY

TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST

LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES

INVERSIONES" button_text="POR QUÉ TARAPACÁ" button_link="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIwOTYifX0=@" body_text_align="right" custom_button="on" button_text_size="20px" button_font="Poppins|600||on|||||" button_use_icon="on" button_icon="%%40%%" text_orientation="center" sticky_transition="on"]

Chile es reconocido mundialmente por ser la economía más competitiva de América Latina, la cual ofrece una gran cantidad de oportunidades de inversión, con diferentes programas de incentivos para los inversionistas.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="INDUSTRIA Y LOGÍSTICA ECOAMIGABLE" button_text="LEER MÁS" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/en/opportunity/eco-friendly-ind" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/ecoamigable-1.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="1.5em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/en/opportunity/eco-friendly-ind/" sticky_transition="on"]

Involucra una mirada sostenible y tecnológica de los Principales sectores industriales de la región, buscando una transición hacia las energías renovables y la incorporación de interconectividad y automatización en los procesos productivos. De esta forma, los principales factores competitivos de la región con su importante industria minera, su potencial energético fotovoltaico y el comercio presente a través del puerto de Iquique y la Zofri.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="INDUSTRIAS VERDES Y AGRITECH" button_text="LEER MÁS" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-verdes-y-agritech/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Agritech-2.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="1.5em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-verdes-y-agritech/" sticky_transition="on"]

Las condiciones edafoclimáticas presentes en la región, además de sus pisos ecológicos, la sitúan en una posición ideal para el desarrollo especies de alto valor alimentario. De esta manera, se encuentran alimentos como la quinua en el altiplano; limón de Pica, azafrán y dátiles en la pampa; y productos marinos típicos como pescados o mariscos, además de otros de diversas aplicaciones biotecnológicas como las microalgas.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="TURISMO DE INTERESES ESPECIALES" button_text="LEER MÁS" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/turismo/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/turismo.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="4em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/turismo/" sticky_transition="on"]

En el sector turístico, la Región de Tarapacá tiene una amplia oferta, destacando el turismo de bienestar y salud, con sus playas, paisajes desérticos, de altura y salares; turismo arqueológico y paleontológico en sus huellas de dinosaurios, geoglifos, icnitas y otros vestigios de las culturas precolombinas; turismo corporativo con sus costas y su clima ideal para congresos y conferencias; y su turismo étnico cultural con las influencias quechua y aimaras y sus fiestas religiosas.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="CALIDAD DE VIDA Y TERRITORIOS INTELIGENTES" button_text="LEER MÁS" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/calidad-de-vida/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Calidad-1.jpg" heading_last_edited="off|desktop" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="1.5em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/calidad-de-vida/" header_font_tablet="" header_font_phone="" header_font_last_edited="on|desktop" border_width_all_image="1px" border_color_all_image="#E5E2EB" sticky_transition="on"]

La Región presenta ciertas ventajas y oportunidades para ubicarse a la vanguardia en sustentabilidad a nivel nacional y
mejorar la calidad de vida de su población. La reciente creación del Centro de Economía Circular para la macrozona
norte del país y su potencial en energía solar abren un panorama favorable para el desarrollo de la economía circular en la región, que además ocupa el 3er lugar a nivel latinoamericano en el Índice de Desarrollo Humano Subnacional, desarrollado por la Universidad Autónoma de Barcelona el año 2018.
