wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
ATRACCIÓN DE INVERSIONES

Chile es reconocido mundialmente por ser la economía más competitiva de América Latina, la cual ofrece una gran cantidad de oportunidades de inversión, con diferentes programas de incentivos para los inversionistas.

POR QUÉ TARAPACÁ

INDUSTRIA Y LOGÍSTICA ECOAMIGABLE

Involucra una mirada sostenible y tecnológica de los Principales sectores industriales de la región, buscando una transición hacia las energías renovables y la incorporación de interconectividad y automatización en los procesos productivos. De esta forma, los principales factores competitivos de la región con su importante industria minera, su potencial energético fotovoltaico y el comercio presente a través del puerto de Iquique y la Zofri.
LEER MÁS

INDUSTRIAS VERDES Y AGRITECH

Las condiciones edafoclimáticas presentes en la región, además de sus pisos ecológicos, la sitúan en una posición ideal para el desarrollo especies de alto valor alimentario. De esta manera, se encuentran alimentos como la quinua en el altiplano; limón de Pica, azafrán y dátiles en la pampa; y productos marinos típicos como pescados o mariscos, además de otros de diversas aplicaciones biotecnológicas como las microalgas.
LEER MÁS

TURISMO DE INTERESES ESPECIALES

En el sector turístico, la Región de Tarapacá tiene una amplia oferta, destacando el turismo de bienestar y salud, con sus playas, paisajes desérticos, de altura y salares; turismo arqueológico y paleontológico en sus huellas de dinosaurios, geoglifos, icnitas y otros vestigios de las culturas precolombinas; turismo corporativo con sus costas y su clima ideal para congresos y conferencias; y su turismo étnico cultural con las influencias quechua y aimaras y sus fiestas religiosas.
LEER MÁS

CALIDAD DE VIDA Y TERRITORIOS INTELIGENTES

La Región presenta ciertas ventajas y oportunidades para ubicarse a la vanguardia en sustentabilidad a nivel nacional ymejorar la calidad de vida de su población. La reciente creación del Centro de Economía Circular para la macrozonanorte del país y su potencial en energía solar abren un panorama favorable para el desarrollo de la economía circular en la región, que además ocupa el 3er lugar a nivel latinoamericano en el Índice de Desarrollo Humano Subnacional, desarrollado por la Universidad Autónoma de Barcelona el año 2018.

button_link="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjQyMTYifX0=@" _module_preset="default" header_level="h1" header_font="Poppins|600|||||||" header_text_align="center" header_font_size="39px" header_letter_spacing="5px" header_line_height="2em" body_font="Poppins|500|||||||" body_text_align="right" custom_button="on" button_text_size="20px" button_font="Poppins|600||on|||||" button_use_icon="on" button_icon="%%40%%" text_orientation="center" link_option_url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjQyMTYifX0=@" hover_enabled="0" sticky_transition="on" sticky_enabled="0"]

Chile is recognized worldwide for being the most competitive economy in Latin America, which offers a large number of investment opportunities, with different incentive programs for investors.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjQxNzAifX0=@" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/ecofriendly-1.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.10" _dynamic_attributes="button_link,link_option_url" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="2em" link_option_url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjQxNzAifX0=@" sticky_transition="on"]

It involves a sustainable and technological outlook of the main industrial areas of the region, aiming for a transition towards renewable energy and the incorporation of interconnectivity and automatization of the productive processes. In this way, the main competitive factors of the region are based on its influential mining industry, photovoltaic energy potential, and the existing trade through the port in Iquique and Zofri.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="GREEN AND AGRITECH INDUSTRY" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjI0OTQifX0=@" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Agritech.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.10" _dynamic_attributes="button_link,link_option_url" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="4em" link_option_url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjI0OTQifX0=@" sticky_transition="on"]

The edaphoclimatic conditions present in the region, in addition to its ecological levels, place it in an ideal position for the development of species of high nutritional value. In this way, foods such as quinoa are found in the highlands; Pica lemon, saffron and dates in the pampas; and typical marine products such as fish or shellfish, as well as others with various biotechnological applications such as microalgae.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjI1MDIifX0=@" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Tourism.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.10" _dynamic_attributes="button_link,link_option_url" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="4em" link_option_url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjI1MDIifX0=@" sticky_transition="on"]

In the tourism industry, the Tarapacá Region has a wide offer, highlighting wellness and health tourism, with its beaches, desert landscapes, high altitude and salts; archaeological and paleontological tourism in its dinosaur footprints, geoglyphs, ichnites and other vestiges of pre-Columbian cultures; corporate tourism with its coasts and its ideal climate for congresses and conferences; its ethnic-cultural tourism with Quechua and Aymara influences and its religious festivals.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjI0OTgifX0=@" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/quality-1.jpg" heading_last_edited="off|desktop" _builder_version="4.9.10" _dynamic_attributes="button_link,link_option_url" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="2em" link_option_url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjI0OTgifX0=@" header_font_tablet="" header_font_phone="" header_font_last_edited="on|desktop" border_width_all_image="1px" border_color_all_image="#E5E2EB" sticky_transition="on"]

The Region presents certain advantages and opportunities to be at the forefront of sustainability at a national level and improve the quality of life of its population. The recent creation of the Circular Economy Center for the northern macro zone of the country and its potential in solar energy opens up a favorable outlook for the development of the circular economy in the region, which also ranks 3rd in Latin America in the Human Development Index Subnational, developed by the Autonomous University of Barcelona in 2018.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="atraccion" _builder_version="4.9.7" background_color="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" background_image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Form-03-4.png" custom_margin="-3px||-3px||true|" custom_padding="0px||23px|||" border_color_all="#31d190" locked="off"][et_pb_row admin_label="Fila" _builder_version="4.9.7" min_height="130px" custom_margin="3px|auto||auto||" custom_padding="2px||0px|||" collapsed="off"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="link_option_url" background_color="RGBA(0,0,0,0)" background_enable_image="off" custom_padding="|||" link_option_url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjI1MiJ9fQ==@" border_width_bottom="3px" border_color_bottom="#E09900" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.7" text_font="Poppins|600|||||||" text_text_color="#0E1833" text_font_size="25px" text_letter_spacing="10px" header_font="Poppins||||||||" header_font_size="25px" header_letter_spacing="10px" header_2_font="Poppins|800||on|||||" header_2_text_color="#000000" header_2_font_size="60px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" header_3_font="Poppins||||||||" header_3_font_size="25px" header_4_font="Poppins||||||||" header_4_font_size="22px" background_enable_image="off" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="38px||74px||false|false" custom_padding="0px||0px|||" header_2_font_size_tablet="40px" header_2_font_size_phone="25px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" border_width_bottom="3px" border_color_bottom="#E09900" locked="off"]

Desarrollo sostenible territorial mediante inversiones de impacto

01    Creación e implementación de políticas, estratégicas y planes de aceleración del desarrollo sostenible territorial mediante atracción de inversiones de impacto a sectores público y privado.

02    Diseño de ofertas de valor y carteras de oportunidades para la inversión de triple impacto.

03    Diseño y formación de agencias y capacidades territoriales para la atracción de inversiones de impacto.

04    Inteligencia y vigilancia competitiva en oportunidades de Mercado con alto potencial de inversión.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.9.7" background_enable_color="off" background_position="top_left" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins|600|||||||" text_text_color="#E6332A" text_letter_spacing="2px" text_line_height="1.2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||" header_text_align="left" header_text_color="#0E1621" header_font_size="18px" header_line_height="2em" custom_margin="0px|||||" custom_padding="|50px||||"]

Atracción y promoción de inversiones de impacto

01    Diseño e implementación de estratégias y planes de dinamización de Ecosistemas de emprendimiento, innovación e inversiones de impacto.

02    Gestión y realización de foros y encuentros empresariales y de negocios sostenibles e inversión de impacto.

03    Difusión de métodos y tecnologías de interés para la atracción de inversiones de impacto.

04    Identificación de potenciales inversionistas tecnológicos y de capitales a proyectos de inversión de impacto.

05    Asesoría y formación de emprendimientos que inicien su etapa de Escalamiento.

IDENTIFICAMOS LA OFERTA DE VALOR TERRITORIAL

 

 

y su cartera de oportunidades de inversión

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Split Section" _builder_version="4.9.7" background_enable_color="off" background_image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/ebook-17-1.png" background_blend="screen" custom_margin="-19px|||||" custom_padding="50px||0px|||" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="bottom" animation_intensity_fold="4%" global_module="3516" saved_tabs="all" locked="off"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" use_custom_gutter="on" gutter_width="1" make_equal="on" module_class=" et_pb_row_fullwidth" _builder_version="4.9.7" background_size="initial" background_position="top_left" background_repeat="repeat" width="100%" width_tablet="100%" width_phone="" width_last_edited="on|desktop" max_width="100%" max_width_tablet="100%" max_width_phone="" max_width_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_margin="0px|auto|-4px|auto||" custom_padding="0px||35px|50px||" make_fullwidth="on"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.9.7" background_enable_color="off" background_position="top_left" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins|600|||||||" text_text_color="#E6332A" text_letter_spacing="2px" text_line_height="1.2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||" header_text_align="left" header_text_color="#0E1621" header_font_size="18px" header_line_height="2em" custom_padding="|50px||||"]

Desarrollo sostenible territorial mediante inversiones de impacto

01    Creación e implementación de políticas, estratégicas y planes de aceleración del desarrollo sostenible territorial mediante atracción de inversiones de impacto a sectores público y privado.

02    Diseño de ofertas de valor y carteras de oportunidades para la inversión de triple impacto.

03    Diseño y formación de agencias y capacidades territoriales para la atracción de inversiones de impacto.

04    Inteligencia y vigilancia competitiva en oportunidades de Mercado con alto potencial de inversión.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.9.7" background_enable_color="off" background_position="top_left" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" text_font="Poppins|600|||||||" text_text_color="#E6332A" text_letter_spacing="2px" text_line_height="1.2em" header_font="Poppins||||||||" header_text_align="left" header_text_color="#0E1621" header_font_size="18px" header_line_height="2em" custom_margin="0px|||||" custom_padding="7px|50px||50px||"]

Atracción y promoción de inversiones de impacto

01    Diseño e implementación de estratégias y planes de dinamización de Ecosistemas de emprendimiento, innovación e inversiones de impacto.

02    Gestión y realización de foros y encuentros empresariales y de negocios sostenibles e inversión de impacto.

03    Difusión de métodos y tecnologías de interés para la atracción de inversiones de impacto.

04    Identificación de potenciales inversionistas tecnológicos y de capitales a proyectos de inversión de impacto.

05    Asesoría y formación de emprendimientos que inicien su etapa de Escalamiento.

INVESTMENTS" button_text="WHY TARAPACÁ" button_link="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIwOTYifX0=@" header_level="h1" header_font="Poppins|600|||||||" header_text_align="center" header_font_size="39px" header_letter_spacing="5px" header_line_height="2em" body_font="Poppins|500|||||||" body_text_align="right" custom_button="on" button_text_size="20px" button_font="Poppins|600||on|||||" button_use_icon="on" button_icon="%%40%%" text_orientation="center" sticky_transition="on"]

Chile is recognized worldwide for being the most competitive economy in Latin America, which offers a large number of investment opportunities, with different incentive programs for investors.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-log-y-amigable/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/ecofriendly-1.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="2em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-log-y-amigable//" sticky_transition="on"]

It involves a sustainable and technological outlook of the main industrial areas of the region, aiming for a transition towards renewable energy and the incorporation of interconnectivity and automatization of the productive processes. In this way, the main competitive factors of the region are based on its influential mining industry, photovoltaic energy potential, and the existing trade through the port in Iquique and Zofri.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="GREEN AND AGRITECH INDUSTRY" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-verdes-y-agritech/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Agritech.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="4em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-verdes-y-agritech/" sticky_transition="on"]

The edaphoclimatic conditions present in the region, in addition to its ecological levels, place it in an ideal position for the development of species of high nutritional value. In this way, foods such as quinoa are found in the highlands; Pica lemon, saffron and dates in the pampas; and typical marine products such as fish or shellfish, as well as others with various biotechnological applications such as microalgae.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/turismo/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Tourism.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="4em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/turismo/" sticky_transition="on"]

In the tourism industry, the Tarapacá Region has a wide offer, highlighting wellness and health tourism, with its beaches, desert landscapes, high altitude and salts; archaeological and paleontological tourism in its dinosaur footprints, geoglyphs, ichnites and other vestiges of pre-Columbian cultures; corporate tourism with its coasts and its ideal climate for congresses and conferences; its ethnic-cultural tourism with Quechua and Aymara influences and its religious festivals.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/calidad-de-vida/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/quality-1.jpg" heading_last_edited="off|desktop" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="2em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/calidad-de-vida/" header_font_tablet="" header_font_phone="" header_font_last_edited="on|desktop" border_width_all_image="1px" border_color_all_image="#E5E2EB" sticky_transition="on"]

The Region presents certain advantages and opportunities to be at the forefront of sustainability at a national level and improve the quality of life of its population. The recent creation of the Circular Economy Center for the northern macro zone of the country and its potential in solar energy opens up a favorable outlook for the development of the circular economy in the region, which also ranks 3rd in Latin America in the Human Development Index Subnational, developed by the Autonomous University of Barcelona in 2018.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
ATTRACTION OF INVESTMENTS

Chile is recognized worldwide for being the most competitive economy in Latin America, which offers a large number of investment opportunities, with different incentive programs for investors.

WHY TARAPACÁ

ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS

It involves a sustainable and technological outlook of the main industrial areas of the region, aiming for a transition towards renewable energy and the incorporation of interconnectivity and automatization of the productive processes. In this way, the main competitive factors of the region are based on its influential mining industry, photovoltaic energy potential, and the existing trade through the port in Iquique and Zofri.
READ MORE

GREEN AND AGRITECH INDUSTRY

The edaphoclimatic conditions present in the region, in addition to its ecological levels, place it in an ideal position for the development of species of high nutritional value. In this way, foods such as quinoa are found in the highlands; Pica lemon, saffron and dates in the pampas; and typical marine products such as fish or shellfish, as well as others with various biotechnological applications such as microalgae.
READ MORE

TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST

In the tourism industry, the Tarapacá Region has a wide offer, highlighting wellness and health tourism, with its beaches, desert landscapes, high altitude and salts; archaeological and paleontological tourism in its dinosaur footprints, geoglyphs, ichnites and other vestiges of pre-Columbian cultures; corporate tourism with its coasts and its ideal climate for congresses and conferences; its ethnic-cultural tourism with Quechua and Aymara influences and its religious festivals.
READ MORE

LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES

The Region presents certain advantages and opportunities to be at the forefront of sustainability at a national level and improve the quality of life of its population. The recent creation of the Circular Economy Center for the northern macro zone of the country and its potential in solar energy opens up a favorable outlook for the development of the circular economy in the region, which also ranks 3rd in Latin America in the Human Development Index Subnational, developed by the Autonomous University of Barcelona in 2018.
READ MORE

The edaphoclimatic conditions present in the region, in addition to its ecological levels, place it in an ideal position for the development of species of high nutritional value. In this way, foods such as quinoa are found in the highlands; Pica lemon, saffron and dates in the pampas; and typical marine products such as fish or shellfish, as well as others with various biotechnological applications such as microalgae.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/turismo/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Tourism.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="4em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/turismo/" sticky_transition="on"]

In the tourism industry, the Tarapacá Region has a wide offer, highlighting wellness and health tourism, with its beaches, desert landscapes, high altitude and salts; archaeological and paleontological tourism in its dinosaur footprints, geoglyphs, ichnites and other vestiges of pre-Columbian cultures; corporate tourism with its coasts and its ideal climate for congresses and conferences; its ethnic-cultural tourism with Quechua and Aymara influences and its religious festivals.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/calidad-de-vida/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/quality-1.jpg" heading_last_edited="off|desktop" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="2em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/calidad-de-vida/" header_font_tablet="" header_font_phone="" header_font_last_edited="on|desktop" border_width_all_image="1px" border_color_all_image="#E5E2EB" sticky_transition="on"]

The Region presents certain advantages and opportunities to be at the forefront of sustainability at a national level and improve the quality of life of its population. The recent creation of the Circular Economy Center for the northern macro zone of the country and its potential in solar energy opens up a favorable outlook for the development of the circular economy in the region, which also ranks 3rd in Latin America in the Human Development Index Subnational, developed by the Autonomous University of Barcelona in 2018.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
ATTRACTION OF INVESTMENTS

Chile is recognized worldwide for being the most competitive economy in Latin America, which offers a large number of investment opportunities, with different incentive programs for investors.

WHY TARAPACÁ

ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS

It involves a sustainable and technological outlook of the main industrial areas of the region, aiming for a transition towards renewable energy and the incorporation of interconnectivity and automatization of the productive processes. In this way, the main competitive factors of the region are based on its influential mining industry, photovoltaic energy potential, and the existing trade through the port in Iquique and Zofri.
READ MORE

GREEN AND AGRITECH INDUSTRY

The edaphoclimatic conditions present in the region, in addition to its ecological levels, place it in an ideal position for the development of species of high nutritional value. In this way, foods such as quinoa are found in the highlands; Pica lemon, saffron and dates in the pampas; and typical marine products such as fish or shellfish, as well as others with various biotechnological applications such as microalgae.
READ MORE

TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST

In the tourism industry, the Tarapacá Region has a wide offer, highlighting wellness and health tourism, with its beaches, desert landscapes, high altitude and salts; archaeological and paleontological tourism in its dinosaur footprints, geoglyphs, ichnites and other vestiges of pre-Columbian cultures; corporate tourism with its coasts and its ideal climate for congresses and conferences; its ethnic-cultural tourism with Quechua and Aymara influences and its religious festivals.
READ MORE

LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES

The Region presents certain advantages and opportunities to be at the forefront of sustainability at a national level and improve the quality of life of its population. The recent creation of the Circular Economy Center for the northern macro zone of the country and its potential in solar energy opens up a favorable outlook for the development of the circular economy in the region, which also ranks 3rd in Latin America in the Human Development Index Subnational, developed by the Autonomous University of Barcelona in 2018.
READ MORE

INVESTMENTS" button_text="WHY TARAPACÁ" button_link="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIwOTYifX0=@" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Tarapaca-Investments-01-1-e1623892754204.png" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_level="h1" header_font="Poppins|600|||||||" header_text_align="center" header_font_size="39px" header_letter_spacing="5px" header_line_height="2em" body_font="Poppins|500|||||||" body_text_align="right" custom_button="on" button_text_size="20px" button_font="Poppins|600||on|||||" button_use_icon="on" button_icon="%%40%%" text_orientation="center" sticky_transition="on"]

Chile is recognized worldwide for being the most competitive economy in Latin America, which offers a large number of investment opportunities, with different incentive programs for investors.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="ECO-FRIENDLY INDUSTRY AND LOGISTICS" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-log-y-amigable/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/ecofriendly-1.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="2em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-log-y-amigable//" sticky_transition="on"]

It involves a sustainable and technological outlook of the main industrial areas of the region, aiming for a transition towards renewable energy and the incorporation of interconnectivity and automatization of the productive processes. In this way, the main competitive factors of the region are based on its influential mining industry, photovoltaic energy potential, and the existing trade through the port in Iquique and Zofri.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="GREEN AND AGRITECH INDUSTRY" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-verdes-y-agritech/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Agritech.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="4em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/ind-verdes-y-agritech/" sticky_transition="on"]

The edaphoclimatic conditions present in the region, in addition to its ecological levels, place it in an ideal position for the development of species of high nutritional value. In this way, foods such as quinoa are found in the highlands; Pica lemon, saffron and dates in the pampas; and typical marine products such as fish or shellfish, as well as others with various biotechnological applications such as microalgae.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="TOURISM OF SPECIAL INTEREST" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/turismo/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Tourism.jpg" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="4em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/turismo/" sticky_transition="on"]

In the tourism industry, the Tarapacá Region has a wide offer, highlighting wellness and health tourism, with its beaches, desert landscapes, high altitude and salts; archaeological and paleontological tourism in its dinosaur footprints, geoglyphs, ichnites and other vestiges of pre-Columbian cultures; corporate tourism with its coasts and its ideal climate for congresses and conferences; its ethnic-cultural tourism with Quechua and Aymara influences and its religious festivals.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading="LIFE QUALITY AND SMART TERRITORIES" button_text="READ MORE" button_link="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/calidad-de-vida/" image="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/quality-1.jpg" heading_last_edited="off|desktop" _builder_version="4.9.7" _dynamic_attributes="button_link" _module_preset="default" header_font_size="25px" header_line_height="2em" link_option_url="https://tarapacainvestments.cl/oportunidades/calidad-de-vida/" header_font_tablet="" header_font_phone="" header_font_last_edited="on|desktop" border_width_all_image="1px" border_color_all_image="#E5E2EB" sticky_transition="on"]

The Region presents certain advantages and opportunities to be at the forefront of sustainability at a national level and improve the quality of life of its population. The recent creation of the Circular Economy Center for the northern macro zone of the country and its potential in solar energy opens up a favorable outlook for the development of the circular economy in the region, which also ranks 3rd in Latin America in the Human Development Index Subnational, developed by the Autonomous University of Barcelona in 2018.
